Dont get me wrong the game itself can be fun I have a good number of hours into it over the years The single player was also quite good Truthfully there are quite a few reasons to recommend or buy this game if you never have but given the company behind it and the way they treat their patrons and players handle their business communicate things etc I just cant recommend anyone support this I firmly believe that we vote with our wallets and the only way to really impact the bottom line of these greedy corporations is to not buy the shit they are selling if we dont like it Thats how we make them wake up and thats how we get the changes we want At the time of release we didnt know what we know now The game is what nearly a decade old at this point No new game no real new content just rehashed things for online Egregious actions such as removing items from the game that people paid for and removing the anticheat system to prevent it from being a cesspool in public online lobbies These are just core things that you should not do and yet they do them The price of things use to be somewhat reasonable it was a nice balance of grind vs reward upon launch Now everything is so overpriced its not worth it to grind for and this was done solely with the malicious intentions to force players to buy shark cards for real money to acquire in game items The only thing we are missing at this point is a battle pass then we really will be at the peak of modern games Anyway if you already own this game by all means enjoy it I implore you not to buy their shark cards and if you dont already own this game just pass on this Save your money or take it elsewhere preferably to a companydeveloper that doesnt choose to do the most despicable things at every turn

Mostly Positive I didnt like the main story because I dont relate with psychopaths so I didnt finish it But there is enough to do in the online game for PVE with some friends in a closed session I generally avoided PVP since there are too many hackers that have ruined open sessions You can solo play most of the online game in a closed session and I tried that for a while but ultimately got bored quickly If you buy a military vehicle you generally cant use it in the heists except the setup missions but you can use them for cargo nightclub and motoclub The humor in newer updates such as drug wars has become more crassannoying and less tongueincheek They still havent fixed the slow player controls after all these years The only reason I have so many hours in the game is because there was a time when I could go AFK while the nightclub accumulated but they changed that I recommend buying this on sale if youre looking for something different to play but dont expect too much Once you get to the endgame theres nothing to do other than collect expensive useless vehicles Dont hesitate to move on to a different game at that point

Ah Grand Theft Auto V the game that proves crime can be a family affair From the moment I first stepped into Los Santos I knew I was in for one wild ride You see this game has it all  action mayhem and a touch of good ol family drama

The city itself is stunning and its like a virtual playground for chaos I mean Ive stolen planes jumped out of helicopters and even robbed a few stores with my pals Franklin and Trevor Its like a neverending vacation except with more gunfights and fewer piña coladas

Franklin is the man when it comes to driving Hes got a need for speed thats just as crazy as mine but with fewer traffic accidents Trevor on the other hand is well lets just say hes a unique character Hes the kind of guy you dont want to cross but hes also the kind of guy you cant help but laugh at His explosive personality matches the explosive action in the game

And dont get me started on the missions From heists to drug deals gone wrong its like a neverending rollercoaster of adrenaline Theres something truly satisfying about pulling off a perfectly executed heist and then escaping from the cops like a bunch of pros

But its not all about crime You can play tennis go for a round of golf or just chill out by the beach Los Santos is the perfect place for a getaway as long as you dont mind the occasional gang shootout or police chase

In a nutshell GTA V is like a Hollywood blockbuster that you get to star in So grab your virtual sunglasses hop in a stolen car and get ready for a wild ride Just remember crime doesnt payunless youre playing this game

I bought this game twice on Xbox but never finished it because first one disc got trashed then when I got a second my xbox was trashed So I picked this up in a sale on pc to finally finish it

The bad points
 The open world is great but often meaningless This was a criticism of mine for San Andreas albeit one of the greatest games of all time You can go somewhere and it looks nice but is there any purpose or meaning If you want to shoot beachgoers yes but not a lot else It reminded me of Fallout IV where you can build a base with a pool table but why when no one interact with you
 They really need to put manual gearchanges in to their next GTA I know lots of US vehicles are auto but the driving is boring in that there is no satisfaction of dropping a gear to get up a hill or overtake
 the speed is restrictedunrealistic watching the speedometer I think it goes up to 100mph for pretty much all cars really a Ferrari or whatever doing 100mph max You should be able to push it to 155 and be punished for doing so by wrapping yourself around a tree It makes driving half the game really quite timid
 Most missions are still just drive bangshootdrive crash drive finish
Look I know it is GTA but still the missions are quite repetitive and feel quite dumb in the great environment that there is
 Controls when walking are awkward I think this is much better in RDR2 hopefully it will be for any future GTA because the number of missions I messed up because the controls are clanky is huge I never finished GTA IV because the controls were clanky and I got sick of being called for dates to go bowling etc
 all the money houses businesses side games dont seem to matter as you can finish tthe story quite early After the first couple of missions I never went to an Ammunation again I tried to use the stock market but didnt have enough to invest then when I did it was pretty much the end of the game The golf and tennis is nice but after a while you think what is the point might as well get a golf or tennis game And I totally forgot until now there was hunting
 They spent WAY too much time on doing the whole strip club thing
 Collectables were a bit meh the whole underwater thing way too time consuming compared to tagging in San Andreas which was fun

So many criticisms yet still a thumbs up

Because if you play through the story just have a laugh it is great fun and recommended and ultimately I am glad I played it I think years ago the side elements of GTA were as good as even full games but now GTA feels a bit of a jack of all trades master of none refining the driving and nicely fluid footcombat controls in future might help

Love the characters though just wish there had been twice the story

So the story mode in this game Its a real joy You can just cruise around have fun and get lost in the game world But lets talk about the online mode where things take a frustrating turn due to those pesky modders

Trying to get a simple Heist prep done becomes an ordeal when modders are lurking around They can blow you up or take you out as soon as youre about to reach your destination It feels like theyre everywhere on almost every server Even if you try to report them its often futile because they can crash your game and erase any trace of your report from Rockstars system leaving them scotfree

These modders arent just satisfied with ruining gameplay they also spam the ingame chat with ads making it beyond annoying Whats worse their activities can make the servers lag due to the sheer volume of their antics Today I ran into a modder who at first seemed like a savior by freeing me from a submarine another modder had trapped me in But then they turned the tables by making my character noclip sending me soaring into the sky and then plummeting me to my death They also teleported me away from my destination just when I was about to reach it All in all the online experience on these servers is nothing short of a disaster

To sum it up while the story mode is all fun and games the online mode is marred by these modders who take the fun out of it and create a pretty frustrating environment for players

HEY I KNOW YOUR KINDA HUNGRY BUT DO I GOT A GOOD TAMALES GUIDE FOR YOU 
step by step so you cant miss it

INGREDIENTS
FOR THE FILLING
1 pound boneless pork shoulder
12 large white onion
2 cloves garlic divided
1 bay leaf
1 pound tomatillos
4 serrano peppers
1 tablespoon canola oil
1 tablespoon kosher salt plus more for seasoning
1 teaspoon ground cumin
1 teaspoon Mexican oregano
12 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more for seasoning

FOR THE DOUGH
1 large package dried corn husks about 1 pound
2 pounds fresh masa for tamales purchased from a tortillería not masa preparada or 3 cups masa harina for tamales
12 to 3 cups salted chicken broth not lowsodium
1 14 cups canola oil
2 teaspoons kosher salt
1 12 teaspoons baking powder

EQUIPMENT
Steamer pot
Large pot or bowl
Medium saucepan
Stand mixer or electric hand mixer
Tongs
Blender
Strainer
Slotted spoon
Chefs knife or paring knife and cutting board
Measuring cups and spoons

INSTRUCTIONS
STEP 1 Soak the corn husks Place 1 package corn husks in a large pot or bowl and add enough hot tap water to cover Make sure the husks are submerged by weighing them down with a few coffee mugs

STEP 2 Cook the pork Cut 1 pound pork shoulder into 2inch chunks Season with kosher salt and black pepper Place in a large saucepan Cut 12 large white onion into 2 pieces and add 1 piece to the pan Add 1 of the garlic cloves 1 bay leaf and 2 12 cups water Bring to a simmer over high heat about 7 minutes Reduce the heat to low cover and cook until the pork is fork tender and falling apart stirring every 20 minutes to prevent the bottom of the pot from burning 1 to 1 12 hours total Meanwhile start the chile sauce

STEP 3 Cook the chile sauce ingredients Husk and rinse 1 pound tomatillos Place in a medium saucepan Add the remaining onion piece remaining garlic clove and 4 serrano peppers and cover with 1 inch of cold water Bring to a boil then lower the heat to medium Simmer stirring occasionally until the items have softened about 8 minutes for the tomatillos and peppers and 12 minutes for the onion and garlic Use a slotted spoon to transfer the items to a bowl as they are ready Let cool slightly then coarsely chop the peppers discarding any tough stems onion and garlic

STEP 4 Cool the meat When the pork is ready use a slotted spoon and transfer it to a bowl Remove 14 cup of the broth for the sauce Let the pork cool slightly then shred with your fingers or two forks

STEP 5 Blend the sauce Place the tomatillos chopped chiles onion garlic and 14 cup broth in a blender and blend until smooth

STEP 6 Combine the sauce and meat Heat 1 tablespoon canola oil in a medium saucepan over high heat until shimmering Add the sauce in one quick pour Stir in the shredded pork Add 1 tablespoon kosher salt 1 teaspoon ground cumin 1 teaspoon Mexican oregano and 12 teaspoon black pepper Bring to a boil and cook for 3 to 4 minutes to let the flavors meld The filling should taste saltyit needs to be saltier than youd think to stand out inside the tamales Remove from the heat and set aside

STEP 7 Knead the dough If using masa harina for your dough place 3 cups masa harina in a deep mixing bowl and pour in 2 14 cups chicken broth Mix with your hands until the dough is moist and soft If using fresh masa knead 12 cup chicken broth into 2 pounds masa with your hands until a firm dough forms

STEP 8 Mix the dough Pour 1 14 cups canola oil into a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment Alternatively use an electric hand mixer and large bowl With the mixer on low speed  and dont wear your best clothing because it will splatter  add the masa in golfballsized pieces one at a time The dough may look rather lumpy and unattractive here but it will eventually transform Stop the mixer and sprinkle in 2 teaspoons kosher salt and 1 12 teaspoons baking powder If using masa harina stir in an extra 12 cup chicken broth Mix on high speed until the dough is very light and fluffy about 10 minutes more

STEP 9 Spread the dough inside the husks Remove 1 corn husk from the water and wipe off any extra water with a towel Use a rubber spatula to spread about 14 to 12 cup of dough the amount depends on the size of the corn husk in a large rectangle Leave a few inches of space at the top so the dough doesnt burst out once its cooking and leave about 3 inches of space at the narrower end of the leaf so you have room to fold it

STEP 10 Add the homemade filling Add a small amount of the pork filling about 2 tablespoons in a line down the center of the tamal Dont add too much or else it will spill out of the husk when youre folding it

STEP 11 Fold the tamales closed To close the tamale bring one side of the tamal toward the other like an empanada or a taco and press lightly to seal Then tuck the leaves of the husk over each other into a tubeshape Press down on the narrower end to seal then fold up toward the wider end Set aside folded side down and repeat with the remaining tamales

STEP 12 Steam the tamales for 35 minutes Add water to a steamer pot and line the insert with a layer of corn husks This helps keep the steam trapped inside and adds a bit of flavor Bring the water to a light boil Place the tamales vertically openside up in the steamer but dont pack them too tightly or they wont have room to expand Cover with some extra corn husks Cover and steam until the corn husk easily pulls away from the tamal about 35 minutes

STEP 13 Let the tamales cool 10 to 15 minutes Dont eat the tamales immediately after you remove them from the pot as theyll be too soft still Let the tamales cool for 10 to 15 minutes  theyll firm up quite a bit and be ready to eat

AND THERE YOU GO ENJOY

Grand Theft Auto V GTA V is the quintessential openworld game and even years after its initial release it stands as a testament to the sheer brilliance of Rockstar Games The games arrival on Steam marks an opportunity for gamers old and new to immerse themselves in the sprawling chaotic and endlessly captivating world of Los Santos

Set in the fictional state of San Andreas GTA V tells the intertwining tales of three complex characters Michael a retired bank robber seeking a life of luxury Franklin a skilled repo man eager to escape the streets and Trevor a maniacal force of nature with an insatiable appetite for chaos The storytelling is nothing short of cinematic drawing players into a world of highstakes heists betrayals and a satirical take on modern American culture

The first thing that hits you when you enter Los Santos is the sheer scope of the world The city is a living breathing entity with its inhabitants going about their daily lives contributing to the feeling that youre part of something much larger The attention to detail is staggering from the sparkling skyscrapers to the gritty crimeinfested neighborhoods The game world is a playground that oozes authenticity

GTA V is not just about the story its about the freedom it offers You can jump into countless side activities from racing and sports to skydiving and basejumping The world is your oyster and the depth of content is astounding The heists in particular are standout moments that showcase the games strategic depth and cinematic flair

Gameplay is a perfect blend of shooting driving and general mayhem The controls are tight and the variety of vehicles at your disposal makes exploration enjoyable The shooting mechanics are topnotch and the cover system is a godsend during intense gunfights Whether youre evading the police chasing down criminals or just cruising through the city the gameplay is endlessly engaging

Online multiplayer is where GTA V truly shines GTA Online takes everything great about the singleplayer experience and lets you share it with friends or compete against other players in a massive everevolving world From heists to races free roam activities and ambitious playercreated content GTA Online provides a seemingly limitless array of experiences all while allowing you to build your criminal empire

Visually GTA V still impresses even years after its release The PC version on Steam offers the best graphics with support for high resolutions detailed textures and customizable settings that make the game look even more breathtaking The attention to detail extends to the dynamic weather and daynight cycle which contribute to the immersive experience

While GTA V is a masterpiece its not without its controversy particularly due to its mature themes violence and satirical commentary However for those who can appreciate the game for what it isan openworld work of artit offers a thrilling and unforgettable experience

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V on Steam is a musthave for any gaming enthusiast Its a testament to the boundless creativity and ambition of Rockstar Games offering a world thats a playground for chaos storytelling and exploration If you havent yet experienced the brilliance of Los Santos theres never been a better time to dive in and see what all the hype is about

 Physics despite it being a downgrade compared to GTA IV its still very great and way ahead of its time

 Open World to this day GTA V is probably the greatest free roam of all time in an open world The cars movies buying clothing robberies really anything you can think of honestly

 Story its just iconic Three main characters living the American Dream

 RAGE Engine now this is somewhat apart of the Graphics section I mentioned but I have to talk about the fact that this Engine got made 10 years ago And still holds up to this particular day and age Absolutely amazing

 Map Design Los Santos is a really great map just a very well made replica of LA

 The Modding capabilites I to this day Play this game Modded FiveM the VR Mod Steering wheel support Trainers it really blows out the competition in different games that dont come with modding support

 AtD Attention to Detail R has added alot of AtD to GTA V like the flip flops that Michael can wear literally flip flop

 The Radio the music catalogue in GTA V is very fitting and well thought of R to increase the immersion and make it really feel like a Radio Station the announcers the music the licenses its pretty great honestly

Cons

 Alot parts of the map are Wasteland what do I mean by saying this well despite the map being pretty large Theres alot of spots that are just hills sand and it just gets repititive like Oh hey I have been here before

 All sidecharacters are in my opinion very irritating Despite for example people like Debra while Trevor lived at Vespucci Even though we only get to really see her once in a cutscene before she got killed by Trevor you really could tell how much of an annoyance she would have been if she didnt die

 GTAO back then it was more about being a criminal in online and really playing like it was meant to be Nowadays its filled with Jets MK2 and shark cards that get bought with moms credit cards lovely

Overall

If your looking for a great SP game good Graphics even nowadays and modding capabilites Then you should definetly buy this However the online is at an all time low Its not necessarily great and as mentioned its filled with people who just blow you up so if you really want to play online Just go into Passive Mode

Grand Theft Auto V is an absolute masterpiece that immerses players in a sprawling dynamic openworld filled with endless possibilities With its gripping narrative stunning visuals and revolutionary gameplay it is a game that demands both your attention and support

First and foremost Grand Theft Auto V offers a captivating and cinematic storyline that rivals the best Hollywood blockbusters The narrative follows the lives of three distinct protagonists each with their own motivations and personalities The engaging and complex characters combined with exceptional voice acting and writing create a truly immersive experience that keeps you invested from start to finish

The games world the fictional city of Los Santos is a vibrant and meticulously designed playground that feels alive and bustling with activity The attention to detail is astonishing from the bustling city streets to the sprawling countryside and everything in between Exploring the vast map is an adventure in itself with countless hidden secrets side missions and random encounters that add depth and richness to the experience

The gameplay of Grand Theft Auto V is revolutionary and incredibly diverse Whether youre engaging in thrilling heists participating in intense gunfights or simply enjoying the freedom of causing chaos in the open world the game offers an unparalleled level of immersion and player agency The seamless transition between the three protagonists adds a unique twist allowing you to switch between characters and witness the events from different perspectives

Furthermore Grand Theft Auto Online expands the games already massive world offering a robust multiplayer experience Whether youre teaming up with friends to tackle missions or engaging in adrenalinefueled competitive modes the online component extends the games longevity and provides endless entertainment The constant updates and additions from the developers ensure that theres always something new to discover and enjoy with friends

The developers of Grand Theft Auto V have demonstrated their commitment to delivering an exceptional gaming experience through continuous support and updates The addition of new content including vehicles weapons and missions keeps the game fresh and engaging The dedication to maintaining a thriving online community and the introduction of playercreated content showcase the developers commitment to fostering a vibrant and creative player base

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V is a groundbreaking and immersive gaming experience that combines a gripping narrative stunning visuals and revolutionary gameplay Its vast openworld diverse gameplay mechanics and robust multiplayer component make it a game worth supporting and investing in Prepare to be captivated by the world of Los Santos and embark on an unforgettable journey of crime chaos and camaraderie Your adventure awaits in Grand Theft Auto V

I am a 35 yo father probably one of the oldest people playing this game I am a single father to my Son who is 16 now My son got this game for Christmas in 2022 from his uncle so we installed it on his computer and he started playing By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game This was horrible for me as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him I loaded into the game picked my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well This game reminded me that theres fun to be had in everything and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories

This is one of the funniest outrageous games ever  Humor in most everything  A parody of life in Los Angeles The story is great fun You can play any one of the three main characters at any time after you play through some of the story and for a short time a dog  Listen to the many funny nonplayable characters voices The missions are challenging And even when you dont feel like following the story you can experiment as much as you want explore the sandbox that is its open world  I have played numerous hours every so often since  the game was released I find it a good stress relief from a tough day at work forget about things for a while  If you have never played this masterpiece I highly recommend you try it

Ive owned this game a long time and now I cant play it When I bought it my teenage daughter was sharing my account and the game is tied to one of her old rockstar accounts apparently Shes now an adult and not living with us but before she moved out we created her own steam account and I bought her her own copy of this game Up until now none of this was a problem It was just logged in

But I made this simple mistake of upgrading one of my hard drives I cloned it to a larger faster SSD but in the process Windwows gave it a different letter It suddenly was looking for the launchersocial club on a drive letter that didnt exist and it said I didnt have space to install it A little googling shows a consensus that this is a know issue and the only way to solve it is to use a 3rd party uninstaller to remove every trace of the old program 

I did that and it let me reinstall it Finally But now it wants me to log in with an account that was set up with my daughter close to a decade ago Theres no way around it I cant log in with a new account or with my own rockstar account that is tied to other games I own on this same steam account I would buy another copy just to not have to deal with this BS but I cant do that in Steam with my existing account and even my daughter isnt able to help me So do I have to create a new steam account to play this game Rockstar sucks

Grand Theft Auto V is a highly acclaimed video game that has captivated millions of players worldwide With its immersive openworld setting and engaging gameplay it has undoubtedly become one of the most popular games of all time

One of the aspects that sets Grand Theft Auto V apart is its stunning graphics The visuals are incredibly detailed and realistic bringing the games world to life Whether youre cruising through the bustling streets of Los Santos or exploring the picturesque countryside the attention to detail is truly impressive

Furthermore the gameplay mechanics in Grand Theft Auto V are incredibly robust and varied From highspeed car chases to intense shootouts the game offers a wide range of thrilling activities to keep players entertained The ability to switch between three different protagonists adds an extra layer of depth and excitement to the gameplay experience

The storyline in Grand Theft Auto V is also praiseworthy It follows the lives of three main characters each with their own unique personalities and motivations The narrative is filled with unexpected twists and turns ensuring that players are constantly engaged and eager to see what happens next

In addition to its captivating gameplay and storyline Grand Theft Auto V also boasts a vast openworld environment Los Santos is a sprawling city filled with countless activities and hidden secrets Whether you want to participate in adrenalinepumping heists engage in side missions or simply explore the citys nooks and crannies theres always something to do in this expansive virtual world

Furthermore Grand Theft Auto V has a thriving online multiplayer mode allowing players to connect with friends and strangers alike Whether you want to team up for cooperative missions or engage in competitive multiplayer battles the online component adds a whole new dimension to the game and ensures that players keep coming back for more

Overall Grand Theft Auto V is a masterpiece in the gaming industry Its stunning graphics immersive gameplay captivating storyline and expansive openworld environment make it a mustplay for any video game enthusiast Its no wonder that it continues to be widely praised and loved by gamers around the world

Introduction
Grand Theft Auto V GTA V is not just a video game its an interactive crime saga that continues to captivate players across multiple platforms Developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games GTA V has become a cultural phenomenon since its initial release in 2013 With a vast openworld setting compelling characters and a narrative that weaves together crime humor and drama the game has earned its place as one of the most iconic titles in the gaming industry

Graphics and Presentation 55
GTA Vs sprawling landscape of Los Santos and Blaine County is a visual marvel The attention to detail is staggering with realistic character models dynamic weather systems and a daynight cycle that adds depth to the immersive environment The game seamlessly transitions between the urban chaos of the city to the serene beauty of the countryside creating a living breathing world that feels authentic and alive

Character Development and Narrative 455
The heart of GTA V lies in its three protagonistsMichael Franklin and Trevoreach with their own distinct personalities motivations and story arcs The narrative weaves their tales together in a way that keeps players invested in the lives of these morally ambiguous characters The writing is sharp and the dialogue is filled with humor and social commentary creating a narrative that feels both entertaining and thoughtprovoking

Gameplay and Open World 55
GTA Vs openworld design is a testament to Rockstars mastery of game development The map is vast and diverse offering a mix of urban landscapes suburban neighborhoods and expansive countryside The ability to seamlessly switch between the three protagonists adds a unique layer to the gameplay allowing players to experience different perspectives and playstyles

The games missions are varied and offer a mix of actionpacked heists intense shootouts and entertaining side activities From highspeed chases to leisurely rounds of golf the openworld freedom is one of GTA Vs greatest strengths The addition of GTA Online further extends the gameplay providing a massive multiplayer sandbox for players to explore and engage in criminal enterprises with friends

Soundtrack and Sound Design 55
GTA V boasts a soundtrack that complements the games atmosphere perfectly The radio stations feature a diverse range of music genres providing a dynamic and immersive audio experience The voice acting is topnotch with memorable performances that bring the characters to life The ambient sounds of the city from the bustling streets to the distant sounds of police sirens contribute to the games overall realism

Conclusion
Grand Theft Auto V stands as a landmark achievement in the gaming industry Its combination of stunning graphics engaging narrative diverse gameplay and a meticulously crafted open world sets a standard that few games can match Despite its age GTA V continues to draw players into its criminal underworld proving that its not just a game its an enduring masterpiece that transcends generations Whether youre a newcomer or a returning player GTA V remains a mustplay title that showcases the immense potential of interactive storytelling in gaming

h1 Grand Theft Auto V h1

h2 Review Date h2
October 7 2023

h2 Reviewer Name h2
Schqrk Reviews

h2 Overall Rating h2
810 

hrhr

h2 Graphics and Visuals h2

  Graphics quality and detail The games graphics have come a long way since 2013 and they continue to impress
  Art style and design The openworld of Los Santos is meticulously designed creating a vibrant and immersive environment
  Performance and optimization The game runs smoothly on a midrange PC and the transition from console to PC was seamless
h2 Gameplay h2

  Controls and responsiveness The controls are intuitive allowing for seamless navigation and actionpacked gameplay
  Mechanics and gameplay depth GTA V offers a wide range of activities and missions keeping the gameplay fresh and engaging
  Pacing and balance The pacing is excellent offering both thrilling action and moments of relaxation
h2 Story and Narrative h2

  Plot and storytelling The games storyline is a standout offering compelling characters and memorable moments
  Character development The characters especially the three protagonists are welldeveloped and add depth to the narrative
  Immersion and engagement GTA Vs immersive world keeps you coming back for more even after years of play
h2 Audio and Sound h2

  Soundtrack and music The games intense soundtrack sets the mood for highstakes action 
  Sound effects Realistic sound effects play a critical role in gameplay 
  Voice acting You Forget A Thousand Things Every Day Pal Make Sure This Is One Of Em  Iconic line from the games voice acting Memes like this have become legendary in the gaming community 
h2 Content and Replayability h2

  Game length GTA Vs story mode is substantial and the online mode adds endless hours of gameplay
  Replay value The games replay value is exceptional with every match offering a unique challenge 
  Unlockables and collectibles Unlocking new operators and skins adds to the excitement 
h2 Multiplayer if applicable h2

  Multiplayer functionality Multiplayer is the heart of GTA Online but its important to note that there are no more DLC updates coming to the game
  Online community and matchmaking The online community is thriving with players sharing strategies and memes However its important to mention that future developments for GTA Online might be limited due to the possible release of GTA 6 in the coming years 
  Stability and connection quality Connection quality is generally stable 
h2 Bugs and Technical Issues h2

  Gamebreaking bugs While there have been occasional bugs the development team is usually quick to address them
  Minor glitches Minor issues do pop up but they often lead to funny moments 
  Patch and update history Regular updates and patches keep the game fresh and balanced 
h2 Community and Support h2

  Developer responsiveness The developers actively engage with the community listening to feedback and making improvements 
  Modding support Modding isnt officially supported but the communitys creative content is impressive 
  Community forums and discussions The GTA V community forums and discussions can be both a valuable resource and a place of toxicity and rudeness Its a mixed bag where youll occasionally encounter both friendly and unsavory players 
h2 Final Thoughts h2

  Pros and highlights Tactical gameplay depth of strategy vibrant community and unforgettable moments
  Cons and drawbacks The game can be difficult for new players due to its grind and the hours needed to be put in and the communitys occasional toxicity can be discouraging Playing with friends can significantly enhance the experience
  Would you recommend this game Absolutely especially if you enjoy intense tactical shooters and appreciate a community that embraces humor and memes Be prepared for a steep learning curve and occasional encounters with unfriendly players And you might encounter cheaters and hackers on PC Also keep in mind that there are no more DLC updates planned for GTA Online and the possible release of GTA 6 in the coming years could change the landscape Nevertheless its a game that never loses its charm and youll find yourself saying You Forget A Thousand Things Every Day Pal Make Sure This Is One Of Em just for fun
h2 Additional comments h2
Having played GTA V since 2013 I can confidently say its a game that never gets old The transition to PC was smooth and even though hackers can occasionally disrupt the experience playing with friends makes up for it The storyline remains a standout and while a powerful PC isnt required a midrange modern PC handles the game well Keep in mind that the online mode can be grindy but theres no shortage of activities to keep you entertained in Los Santos With the possibility of GTA 6 on the horizon its an exciting time to be a GTA fan

hrhr

h1 Overall Summary h1
Grand Theft Auto V continues to shine in 2023 as a tactical masterpiece with an engaging storyline and a vibrant online community While newcomers may find the games complexity challenging playing with friends enhances the experience However its important to note that there are no more DLC updates planned for GTA Online and the possible release of GTA 6 in the coming years could change the landscape of the series Despite these considerations GTA V remains a timeless classic that offers countless hours of enjoyment in the sprawling world of Los Santos where even iconic lines like You Forget A Thousand Things Every Day Pal Make Sure This Is One Of Em have become legendary memes in the gaming community

This review is mostly for the online portion of the game
First its a great game

They do weekly updates so every week new stuff is on sale different cars different businesses usually
and theyll change some of the payouts on different tasks heists and businesses

Theres daily tasks you can do that respawn every day in different places as well

It can be a car game a fighting game a shooting game a heist game

The empire building part is what I like
 start a business and set it up most of them can make passive money whenever youre online 
 Arcade Agency Night Club Drug labs Bunker Aircraft Hangar tons of heists arena racing auto shop bike shop warehouses private military stuff whatever you want
And you can run everything all at once

Or you can just run around killing strangers for no reason you will get killed right back though

Game has lots of flaws character mechanics are weird but its a 10 year old game
Its alos really frustrating sometimes either because of some other weird game mechanic or because some rando on the internet decides to give you grief for no reason its part of the game

You can set up private friend only or crew only lobbies now and still do all the missions so I run my nightclub like that do the daily stuff and buy the things I want when they go on sale

Positive Comment

Grand Theft Auto V on PC is an absolute masterpiece when it comes to gaming The graphics are nothing short of breathtaking the level of detail in Los Santos and Blaine County is simply mindblowing From the bustling city streets to the serene countryside every inch of this virtual world is a visual treat

The gameplay is equally exceptional offering a seamless blend of action driving and exploration The controls are smooth and responsive ensuring an immersive experience whether youre cruising in a luxury car or engaging in highoctane shootouts

But what truly sets GTA V apart is its gripping story mode The characters are welldeveloped and the narrative is both thrilling and thoughtprovoking The games multiple protagonists add depth and variety to the storytelling making it an unforgettable journey through the criminal underbelly of Los Santos

Moreover the online mode provides endless hours of fun The variety of activities from heists to races to freeroam shenanigans keeps players engaged for years The regular updates and new content additions by Rockstar Games ensure that the online world of GTA V remains fresh and exciting

Negative Comment

However theres one glaring issue that continues to plague GTA V on PC and thats the rampant presence of modders in the online community While modding can enhance the singleplayer experience and lead to some creative and fun gameplay additions its become a doubleedged sword in the online realm

The presence of malicious modders who disrupt the game spawn impossibletodefeat enemies or harass honest players is a significant drawback It creates a hostile environment that can make online play frustrating and unpleasant for many players The lack of effective anticheat measures has allowed this problem to persist and its disheartening to see that Rockstar hasnt addressed it adequately

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V on PC is an incredible game that excels in graphics gameplay and story mode However the persistent issue with modders in the online community casts a shadow over an otherwise fantastic gaming experience making it challenging for honest players to enjoy the game to its fullest Rockstar Games should take stronger measures to curb this problem and ensure a more enjoyable online experience for all players

Rating  55

Grand Theft Auto V GTA V is a true masterpiece of gaming an extraordinary experience that sets the bar high for openworld actionadventure games Developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games this title has earned its place in the annals of gaming history for its remarkable storytelling vast and immersive world and an unparalleled level of detail

A Thrilling Tale of Crime and Intrigue
At the heart of GTA V is its engrossing narrative The game effortlessly weaves together the stories of three complex protagonists Michael a retired bank robber trying to escape his past Franklin a streetsmart hustler looking for a way out of the gang life and Trevor a volatile and unhinged exmilitary pilot Their paths intersect in a gripping tale of crime ambition and betrayal that keeps players hooked from start to finish

A Living Breathing World
Los Santos the fictional recreation of Los Angeles in GTA V is a marvel in itself Its a sprawling dynamic city filled with bustling streets diverse neighborhoods and an array of activities The attention to detail is astonishing from the realistic traffic patterns to the vibrant ecosystems found in the countryside The world feels alive with pedestrians going about their business radio stations playing music and talk shows and a daynight cycle that adds to the immersion

Endless Activities and Diversions
GTA V offers an abundance of activities beyond the main storyline Whether you want to explore the underwater depths embark on a hunting expedition in the wilderness or engage in a thrilling race theres always something to do The variety of side missions challenges and hobbies ensure that boredom is a concept that doesnt exist in this openworld gem

Unparalleled Attention to Detail
Rockstars dedication to detail is evident in every nook and cranny of the game The characters facial expressions the meticulously designed vehicles the witty ingame radio commentary and the intricate interiors of buildings all contribute to an unparalleled level of immersion Its a testament to the developers commitment to creating a world that feels authentic and livedin

Online Multiplayer
Grand Theft Auto Online adds a whole new dimension to the GTA V experience It allows players to explore Los Santos with friends engage in heists participate in races and create their own criminal empires The constantly evolving online world ensures that theres always something fresh to experience fostering a sense of community and camaraderie among players

Continued Support and Updates
Rockstars commitment to GTA V doesnt end with its initial release The game has received numerous updates expansions and content drops ensuring that it remains relevant and exciting years after its launch This ongoing support speaks to the developers dedication to the GTA V community

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V is a tour de force in the world of gaming a title that effortlessly combines a gripping narrative a living breathing open world and an abundance of activities to create an experience like no other Its attention to detail commitment to storytelling and ongoing support make it an enduring classic that will continue to captivate players for years to come Whether youre a longtime fan of the series or a newcomer GTA V is an absolute mustplay a game that sets the standard for what openworld gaming can achieve

Rating  55

FiveM stands as a true testament to the limitless potential of modding in the gaming world Created by the CitizenFX Collective this modification platform has taken the already incredible Grand Theft Auto V GTA V and transformed it into a dynamic playground of boundless creativity earning its rightful place as a gamechanger in the realm of online multiplayer

Endless Creative Freedom
FiveM catapults GTA V into a realm of infinite possibilities It offers a platform where players and server owners can craft their own multiplayer experiences Whether youre interested in intense roleplaying actionpacked races immersive storytelling or crafting entirely new game modes FiveM provides the canvas and the paintbrush allowing you to create your unique masterpiece within the GTA V universe

A Vibrant and Collaborative Community
At the heart of FiveM is its passionate and thriving community of developers modders and players This collective spirit fuels the platforms constant evolution ensuring that it remains at the forefront of creativity and innovation Whether youre a server owner looking to create a unique experience or a player seeking adventures FiveMs communitydriven development guarantees that theres always something fresh and exciting on the horizon

Stability and Performance Excellence
FiveM places a premium on stability and performance Unlike some other mods FiveM servers are exceptionally reliable and optimized accommodating large player counts without sacrificing performance This commitment to quality ensures that every session is smooth and enjoyable eliminating the frustration of crashes and lag

Immersive RolePlaying Experiences
The roleplaying RP community within FiveM is a shining example of the platforms potential RP servers offer players the opportunity to immerse themselves in intricate and immersive storylines assuming diverse roles within the GTA V world The depth of character development detailed scenarios and player interactions within these servers is unparalleled creating an authentic and engrossing experience that captivates and resonates with players

Diverse Array of Servers
FiveM boasts a diverse selection of servers each offering a unique atmosphere and gameplay experiences Whether youre seeking realism fantasy or something entirely unconventional youll find a server tailored to your preferences This diversity guarantees that every player can discover their ideal FiveM home

Security and Fair Play Emphasis
FiveM places great importance on maintaining a fair and secure gaming environment By implementing anticheat measures and ensuring strict adherence to fair play principles FiveM ensures that all players enjoy a level playing field and a secure space for their adventures in Los Santos

In summary FiveM is nothing short of a revolutionary force in the world of gaming It transcends the boundaries of GTA V opening up a world of limitless creativity collaboration and unparalleled experiences Whether youre interested in roleplaying game development or simply exploring the incredible breadth of playergenerated content FiveM is the ultimate gateway to a universe of boundless adventures within Los Santos Its a shining example of the transformative power of modding and community collaboration and its an absolute musttry for anyone seeking to redefine their GTA V experience

Gourmet Grand Theft Auto 5 A Recipe for Mayhem

Introduction
Turn the virtual world of Grand Theft Auto 5 into a culinary adventure with this tongueincheek recipe While you cant actually cook in the game lets concoct a metaphorical dish that embodies the essence of GTA 5s chaos and action Warning No actual cooking required

Ingredients

A Sprinkle of Recklessness

Start by adding a dash of recklessness to the mix This represents the daring stunts and wild driving that GTA 5 is known for
A Pinch of Crime Drama

Stir in a pinch of crime drama reflecting the games intricate storyline filled with heists and criminal activities
A Dollop of Chaos

Add a dollop of chaos to the mix This symbolizes the mayhem and destruction that players can unleash upon the virtual world
A Splash of Wit and Satire

Incorporate a splash of wit and satire as GTA 5 is known for its humorous take on social and political issues
A Garnish of Immersive Open World

Sprinkle the dish with a garnish of an immersive open world highlighting the vast and detailed landscape of Los Santos
Instructions

In a metaphorical gaming pot combine the recklessness crime drama chaos and satire

Stir vigorously simulating the actionpacked gameplay of GTA 5

Let the mixture simmer while exploring the expansive open world savoring the sights and sounds

Continue to stir occasionally keeping the chaos and unpredictability at the forefront

Serve hot in the form of an unforgettable gaming experience and enjoy the metaphorical flavor of Gourmet Grand Theft Auto 5

Note Eat responsibly

First off the game is great in fact its amazing Everyone knows that  

I cant recommend this game though because of the awful Social Club and equally awful Rockstar Games Services DRM BS you have to deal with  

Played this game fine a few years ago  I go back to play it and it turns out the email I used to set up Social Club is one I no longer have access to  Therefore I cant login and cant play the game Period 

Ive been in contact with Rockstar support for a week and still havent resolved the issue  Ive gone back and forth with them five or six times and every time they want some other proof I bought the damn game Ive sent them four or five screenshots of receipts Steam ID bla bla bla and its never enough  Its ridiculous  Now even though I have a current Social Club account with an email I can actually access they need a THIRD email to use to update my account  WTF  Forget it Im sick of it  I even bought a physical copy off of Ebay to try and get around this issue  No go Physical copy makes no difference  Unless I continue to jump through their hoops I will never be able to play GTAV again on PC  Seriously you guys made tons of money off this game whats the deal with the draconian DRM

Im old enough to remember when you bought a game on PC it came in a nice box with a nice manual and maybe even some bonus items with an actual CD or GASP floppy disk that contained the entire game and it was yours to keep and play forever  Now for your money you get a digital copy thats DRM protected to a ridiculous degree that you cant play if you want to try and change something as simple as your email  Crap like this is why gaming just isnt as fun as it used to be  Those days are gone greed has completely taken over the industry when it comes to AAA games such as this  Loved the GTA series up until this point but this is so stupid guys Im out on GTA6 not that it makes any damn difference

Ive been playing GTA V since its initial release on the Xbox 360 back in 2013 Obviously it wasnt a consistent play time it was off and on Today I received an email stating my account has been suspended for 30 days an my character reset I figured it was a bad attempt at a phishing email so I brushed it off As the day progressed I thought about that email more and more and gave in I loaded up GTA and got into story without any issuesas it should then proceeded to try to join online Right then it hit me Suspended for 30 days and character reset

Since cheating had come to online play I have exclusively played in invite only sessions to avoid the chance of running into someone who would throw money at me Did this make the game slightly more difficult Yes but was worth not having to worry about cheaters

I went to open a ticket to just try to find out what would justify the suspensionreset but I am unable to even do that since you cant dispute the issue GTA you were once a game that I loved and enjoyed playing but this is the end for me Ill patiently wait for GTA VI to release It was a good run

One of the best games ever to be created and played in the history of gaming

Welcome to Los Santos the city where every traffic jam is an opportunity and every pedestrian is a potential punchline Grand Theft Auto V is not just a game its a chaotic carnival of crime where the rules are made to be broken and the laughs come faster than you can steal a sports car

Lets talk about the main characters Michael Trevor and Franklin These guys are like the Three Stooges of the criminal underworld with a little less slapstick and a lot more firepower Michaels midlife crisis is a comedy goldmine Trevor is a walking talking wrecking ball of insanity and Franklin is the guy trying to keep it all together while wondering how he ended up in this circus

Now the city itself is your playground and the possibilities are endless You can rob a bank fly a plane drive a tank or just play a round of golf with the same enthusiasm and incompetence as a toddler in a candy store And if youre feeling particularly artistic you can create your own chaos masterpiece starring you as the criminal Picasso of Los Santos

The radio stations are pure gold with DJs and talk show hosts that are funnier than most standup comedians Youll find yourself driving aimlessly just to hear the next ridiculous radio skit or catchy tune And dont even get me started on the ingame internet Its like a parody of the real thing complete with hilarious ads and social media that makes you question the sanity of the virtual world

But its not all fun and games in Los Santos The police are like an overzealous neighborhood watch on steroids One minor fender bender and suddenly youve got a 5star wanted level and half the citys police force chasing you down Its like the worlds worst game of tag and youre it for life

And lets not forget the pedestrians Theyre like a walking talking sitcom cast Theyll insult you make inappropriate comments and sometimes even try to fight you Its like being in a neverending episode of a reality TV show where everyones competing for the title of Most Outrageous Citizen of Los Santos

In conclusion GTA 5 is a wild openworld sandbox where crime and comedy collide in a spectacularly entertaining fashion Its a game that lets you live out your wildest criminal fantasies while laughing at the sheer absurdity of it all So grab your controller steal a car and get ready for a rollercoaster ride through the hilarious and chaotic world of Grand Theft Auto V

Its unfortunate there is yet to be another game as ambitious as this one A game that could rival the decade old GTA V in scope a game that could be owned and operated by a competent company that actually cares about the state of their project and the satisfaction of the community 

Its a travesty that GTA V is the only game in its class because Rockstar sucks Ill never understand how Ive amassed over a thousand hours on this shitshow of a game that progressively gets worse in an infinite loop of one step forward two steps back Its clear that Rockstar wants to push the game in a FOMO direction and theyre not subtle about it in any way They removed the ability to purchase hundreds of vehicles that had been added over time and they now dripfeed a handful of them every week The GTA battlepass shlock theyre pushing on consoles is only further indicative of this direction They want to incentivize players to pay exuberant prices for ingame content instead of providing more viable means of earning currency ingame As I write this Rockstar is allegedly planning to nerf the BEST way to make money in the game on the basis of wanting to provide players with greater incentives to experience the full range of content available Why not just make EVERYTHING to be a viable source of income Why not increase the payouts of adversary modes and content missions why not make outdated businesses with poor payouts like ImportExport actually viable Because at the end of the day Rockstars main goal is to make money They dont care about encouraging variety in their gameplay They want players to give up the grind and give in to microtransactions Its too bad that the GTA community doesnt have the same solidarity and willpower as other communitiesIm looking at you War Thunder Perhaps if the community created enough of an uproar things would change for the better 

But even if we ignore the blatant greed of Rockstar and the way they have gradually fucked over the economy of the game the state of GTA Online on PC is sad Rockstar has almost entirely neglected the game Everyone knows about the modders Theyre not that big a deal apart from the ones who have the ability to crash the game for YOU specifically among other malicious exploits Ive yet to encounter but they are still a nuisance 

On top of the godmode abusers present in every lobby theres a whole set of content that PC players have been refused access tocontent entirely exclusive to current gen consoles Why No one fucking knows Rockstar is anything BUT transparent It has been over a year since the Expanded and Enhanced edition of GTA released for those platforms yet Rockstar has never once broken silence about the delayed released of the content on PC The entire lack of communication between the community and the developers is inexcusable

Ive put a lot of time into this game and I still continue to despite my grievances but its not worth it If youve yet to play GTA Online or youre considering returning heed my words Do not waste your time with this game At least not in the way I have Have fun blowing your friends up with bazookas Just try not to get caught up in the intoxicating pursuit of wealth

That said GTA Vs story isnt bad A bit dated sure but Id reckon its still worth playing

There are 2 sides to GTA V there is the story mode and there is the online or I guess you could call it hackfest My review isnt on the online portion of the game though I would have to say the game of GTA V is probably one of the most nostalgic and well crafted game mechanics out there If I were to recommend this game to anyone I would recommend to play the story This game has an amazing story to it well put together and just an all around well told story all the way up to the final missions of the game The voice acting is top tier The cast did an amazing job getting you immersed into the story you can genuinely feel the characters and their emotions I would almost say its kind of like a movie almost The game works well not very many bugs maybe a few here and there but what game doesnt This story is one to definitely remember one of the best stories to a modern day game based in todays society portrayed in a really well put way There isnt very many games based in our timeframe or our modern life mostly they are based in the future or way in the past or they are horror games For a game to feel as real as GTA V with top tier voice acting and a well put together story I would have to recommend this game for that reason alone dont play online

h1 My GTA V Review h1
h3 Rating 4 out of 10 stolen cars h3
hrhr

h2 Graphics h2
The graphics of the game are good and even though the game was released over 10 years ago you can still enjoy them However graphics are not the most important aspect as we all know

h2 User Interface h2
The user interface is simple yet clear I have absolutely nothing to complain about in this regard

h2 Performance h2
With my PC Ive never had any issues with the game and could always play it at maximum settings However this also depends on the type of PC you have

h2 Controls h2
The controls are simple and fully customizable but they could offer more I personally miss functions like being able to lie down in combat and sometimes the weapon wheel behaves a bit strangely

h2 Story in Singleplayer  Characters h2
The story mode is decent The narrative isnt outstanding but is still interesting The three main characters are wellwritten although they can sometimes come across as cliché Nonetheless each of them has a limited background story and you understand their motivations for their individual actions Unfortunately I personally miss the ability to influence the story or at least individual missions and the option of three different endings doesnt make it any better when the path to them is absolutely linear and as a player you have no influence on the game world or anything else Ill give half a point for the singleplayer heists which offer at least two different approaches for most heists providing some variety

h2 Character Weapon and Car Customization  Modifications h2
I think its cool that you can customize tune and paint your weapons and cars as you wish both in singleplayer and multiplayer There are more options available for cars which makes sense When it comes to clothing its a bit different While you can customize your character in multiplayer and distribute outfits accordingly you cant do the same in singleplayer The outfits of the playable characters always reset unfortunately you also cant change the main vehicle of the three main characters in singleplayer

h2 Immersion h2
While the game world of GTA V initially looks lively because its filled with NPCs going about their activities it becomes clear that its not quite as dynamic as it appears NPCs sometimes behave strangely repeat the same animations when certain events occur and sometimes they dont even have a sense of orientation For instance I observed a police car ramming into my car repeatedly for about 3 minutes instead of simply going around it Its also bizarre how quickly you can accumulate wanted stars from the police and how fast they arrive respawn and seem to always know your exact location Another annoying feature in multiplayer is the calls you receive every time you enter the game These are usually 2 to 4 calls from NPCs telling you the same things You have to answer these calls each time before you can hang up

h2 City  Game World Exploration h2
The game world is large offering a variety of different areas making it feel like a realistic city and its surroundings Theres a large urban area representing a typical US city areas with a lot of nature and smaller more remote towns

h2 Music h2
The music in the missions is okay but nothing special What I find fantastic however is the selection of radio stations theres something for every musical taste and if someone cant find anything they like theres the feature to add your own music Simply fantastic

h2 Gameplay  Missions in Online Mode h2
After about 10 years the online mode is a joke Initially when I bought the game I liked it because of the many options for character customization apartments garages and the open world to explore and complete missions Unfortunately the game at least for me quickly became boring because the missions are often the same or similar making it less enjoyable

h2 New Content  Updates h2
Over the years some content has been added to the multiplayer not always good content while the singleplayer was left empty New cars and weapons were never implemented in the singleplayer probably because they couldnt make additional money from it

h2 Online Balancing  Pay to Win h2
In multiplayer there are sometimes ridiculously overpowered weapons and cars that throw the games balance out the window These items as well as some clothing and cars are so expensive that its tedious to earn them ingame But luckily you have the option to buy Shark Cards ingame currency with real money Sarcasm This way you can have the perfect combination of overpriced ingame items that paytowin players can easily acquire if theyre willing to invest their hardearned money into an online game

h2 Apartments  Garages h2
When I saw that it was possible to buy apartments and garages at the beginning I was excited and saved up until I could afford one Unfortunately the disappointment was greater than I expected from the cheapest to the most expensive they have very few functions except for being chosen as spawn points and some having a garage for cars You can interact with some things like drinking smoothies watching TV or getting your character so drunk that they pass out While garages still serve a purpose apartments are pretty much useless unless you want to plan heists Youre better off investing your extra money in a good armored car or weapons

h2 Cheaters  Modding h2
I could maybe overlook these other issues if GTA Online could finally deal with the wave of cheaters The problem existed years ago and it still exists today Players who play normally get banned partly because of cheaters who might shower you with a ton of money in a short time resulting in an automatic ban while players who obviously cheat using explosive ammunition becoming invincible teleporting or blatantly spawning cars whales or Ferris wheels dont get banned or it takes forever Today was the first time in a while that I played GTA V and when I entered multiplayer it was hard to find a lobby without at least one cheater unless youre in a private session

h2 Replayability h2
I would play the game again for the story mode as I currently do While other games have captivated me more it always depends on personal preference and the type of games one prefers To experience different endings or have an alternative to multiplayer its worth it

h2 Summary h2
If youre interested in the story mode I can still recommend it but the multiplayer is absolutely not worth it anymore

Grand Theft Auto V My Second Life as a Digital Daredevil

Rating 

Grand Theft Auto V the game where Ive discovered my alter ego as a digital daredevil Move over Evel Knievel Ive got a rocketpropelled motorcycle and a thirst for mayhem

Pros

 Ive learned that in Los Santos the traffic lights are mere suggestions Green red or blue Ill drive through them all  and sometimes even the buildings
 The games pedestrians have a unique way of coping with chaos Theyll scream curse and sometimes even join me in my criminal escapades like theyve been waiting for a chance to break bad
 Ive become a fashion icon Whether Im sporting a tuxedo while robbing a bank or a Hawaiian shirt while parachuting from a helicopter Im always dressed for success
 GTA V has taught me that versatility is key One minute Im a mastermind heist planner the next Im a stuntman extraordinaire and then Im just a guy trying to play golf in the middle of a gang war

Cons

 My sense of traffic rules is a bit skewed in the real world now My passengers arent thrilled when I try to reenact my highway adventures
 My friends and I have turned every online session into a chaotic competition Who can survive the longest with a 5star wanted level Who can jump a motorcycle over the most rooftops The winner gets bragging rights but everyone else ends up in the hospital
 Ive developed a habit of looking for hidden packages in real life hoping to stumble upon a stash of cash or a shiny weapon upgrade So far no luck
 GTA V has ruined my ability to watch a movie without considering how much chaos I can cause with a helicopter in that same scenario

Grand Theft Auto V is a digital playground where you can embrace your inner outlaw explore a sprawling virtual city and create the most insane stories with friends Its the kind of game where youll start a mission but end up in a completely unrelated adventure like skydiving into a military base just for kicks

To those considering a visit to this virtual world Buckle up enjoy the madness and remember that in GTA V the only limit is your imagination and the occasional rocket launcher

In conclusion GTA V is where Ive learned that sometimes lifes best moments happen when you drive off the beaten path literally

Overall rating

Grand Theft Auto V GTA V stands as a true masterpiece of openworld gaming and its not hard to see why Rockstar Games has crafted an experience that delivers on every front from its expansive open world to its captivating characters and engaging gameplay

One of GTA Vs most striking features is the sprawling beautifully detailed city of Los Santos The level of realism and attention to detail is nothing short of astonishing Whether youre cruising down the busy streets exploring the gritty neighborhoods or soaring over the stunning landscape in an aircraft the world feels alive and dynamic The diversity of environments from the urban jungle to the tranquil countryside adds to the games immersive quality

But its not just about the world its the people who inhabit it that make GTA V shine The games three protagonistsMichael Franklin and Trevorare incredibly welldeveloped and offer distinct personalities and backgrounds Their intertwining stories create a narrative thats engaging and full of memorable moments The voice acting is topnotch making these characters feel like real people with their quirks and flaws

The sheer variety of activities and missions is staggering From highoctane heists that require meticulous planning to offbeat side missions that can range from absurd to touching GTA V keeps you constantly entertained The game never forces you down a linear path allowing you to explore at your own pace and choose how you want to tackle missions

 Story 1010
GTA Vs story hooks you harder than a catfish on a fishing line Its like bingewatching the best crime drama while being the star of the show Youre in for a ride and you wont want to get off 

 Open World 1110
Los Santos is basically a character in itself Its like a living breathing city where anything can happen From highspeed chases to epic ramp jumps the possibilities are endless Youre the director of your own action movie

 Music and Visuals 910
The tunes are so fire youll feel like youre in your own music video And the visuals Its like someone poured HD sauce all over your screen You can practically smell the exhaust fumes and feel the citys pulse

 Missions and Side Missions 6910
Every mission is like a mini heist movie Explosions shootouts and more plot twists than a soap opera And the side missions Theyre like little nuggets of gold scattered throughout Los Santos Youll never run out of things to do

 Timeless Classic 1010
Playing this 10 years after release and its still as fresh as a brand new game GTA V was basically the Elon Musk of its timeway ahead of the curve Rockstar really knew what they were doing

 Overall 1010

I just wanted to share with you all my experience playing GTA V Its one of the most immersive and entertaining games Ive ever played The attention to detail in the open world is incredible and the story is both compelling and engaging

I love how much freedom there is in the game  I can choose how to complete missions and what activities to engage in and theres always something new to discover The games graphics and animations are topnotch and the driving and shooting mechanics feel very smooth and satisfying

Ive also spent a ton of time exploring the vast multiplayer mode with my friends which has been an absolute blast Weve tried out all the different game modes available and have had so much fun messing around in the open world with our custom characters

As a gamer I can confidently say that GTA V is one of the best games out there right now and I would definitely recommend it to anyone reading this With its huge amount of content and incredible replayability youll find yourself coming back to GTA V time and again

Grand Theft Auto V is a true masterpiece that continues to captivate players with its deep and immersive gaming universe Its not just a game its an experience that will leave a mark on your gaming memory

Right from the start the game draws you in with its multitude of possibilities and a dynamically alive world From the sprawling city to rural landscapes and untamed nature every corner of the virtual world springs to life before your eyes You can freely explore interact with characters and the environment and of course embark on incredible heists and adventures

The seamless transition between playable characters adds a unique dimension to the gameplay Each of the main protagonists has their own distinct story skills and personality allowing you to fully immerse yourself in diverse aspects of the plot and gameplay

The story campaign in GTA V captivates with its intrigue and unexpected twists Youll encounter thrilling missions that provide an adrenaline rush and serve as a true test of your agility and strategic thinking

The multiplayer mode GTA Online is a sandbox for creativity and fun You can create your own gangs participate in competitions races and join a vast community of players to collaboratively plan elaborate heists or simply enjoy quality time together

Equally impressive is the technical aspect of the game The graphics animations and sound design come together to create an incredibly realistic world that fully engulfs you in the gaming universe

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V remains an undeniable classic in the world of video games Its deep world captivating narrative multifaceted characters and the opportunity for online interaction make it a mustplay for both seasoned gamers and newcomers Dont miss the chance to dive into this unique gaming world and become a part of its history

Grand Theft Auto V GTA V is nothing short of a gaming phenomenon and its easy to see why Rockstar Games has crafted an openworld masterpiece that continues to captivate players worldwide Heres why I cant stop praising this game

First and foremost the openworld of Los Santos is an absolute marvel Its vast diverse and teeming with life From the bustling streets of downtown to the serene beauty of Blaine Countys wilderness every inch of this world feels meticulously designed and alive Whether youre driving like a maniac flying high above the city or exploring off the beaten path theres always something exciting to discover

The story is another highlight With three playable protagonists each with their own unique personality and motivations GTA V offers a narrative experience unlike any other in the series The characters are brilliantly written and the voice acting is topnotch bringing them to life in a way that makes you genuinely care about their fates The heists in particular are thrilling and masterfully executed providing some of the most memorable moments in gaming

The freedom GTA V offers is staggering You can choose to follow the main story embark on countless side missions or simply wreak havoc in the city The variety of activities is mindboggling from adrenalinepumping car chases to leisurely rounds of golf The sense of immersion is unparalleled thanks to the attention to detail in every aspect of the game

Speaking of detail the graphics are a testament to Rockstars dedication to creating a visually stunning experience Even years after its initial release GTA V continues to impress with its realistic lighting weather effects and meticulously crafted environments Its a game that looks and feels ahead of its time

GTA Online adds even more longevity to this already massive game The multiplayer mode allows you to create your own criminal empire participate in heists with friends and engage in a wide range of activities in the everexpanding online world of Los Santos The constant updates and additions from Rockstar keep the online experience fresh and exciting

The soundtrack is legendary featuring a diverse range of music across various radio stations Whether youre into classic rock hiphop or electronic beats youll find something that suits your taste enhancing the atmosphere of the game

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V is a triumph of openworld game design storytelling and sheer fun Its a game that continues to evolve and impress even years after its release If you havent experienced the chaos thrills and adventure of Los Santos theres no better time than now Jump into this virtual playground and get ready for a wild unforgettable ride

REASONS WHY GTA V IS NOT FUN

NO 1 MANGOTHEORY
Mangotheory is a bot that happens to join the lobby and ruin the experience for everyone When it joins the avatar stand still as if AFK with godmode allowing it to be uninterrupted with respawning and starts to promote their MONEYXP and Unlock glitches in the public chat they then promote their discord channel for you to join to acquire cheats This has been confirmed to be a bot by many players Ive spoken to in the chat 

NO 2 Real Cheaters
Unlike Mangotheory a bot you can encounter many real people who have found a way to bring a cheat engine into the public lobbies These players have many abilities to screw over the players in the game
Ability 1 Godmode 
Godmode make the player impossible to kill giving them the advantage to follow you around and kill your avatar anytime they feel like it making it impossible to have fun with others who a trying to enjoy the game
Ability 2 Teleportation 
Teleportation remove the need to chase down another player when trolling Everytime Ive tried to escape a cheater would just teleport right next to me and kill me This Teleportation cheats is so bad that it even allows cheaters to enter a your apartment ingame meaning that even the safe zones arent protected
Ability 3 Messing with your Avatar 
Ive only played this game for a short time but have already lost count of the amount of times my character has been killed out of the blue without any warning Cheaters can essentially nuke a public lobby killing all present players simultaneously which would just lead to an argument in the chat one time i ran into a cheater that made everyone in the lobby slowly levitate into the sky and then dropping us to our deaths and even after respawning you would go back to levitating forcing everyone to leave and join another lobby
Ability 4 Server Wide Kicking 
When a cheater happen to get in an argument with an actual player it always ends with the cheater kicking everyone from the public lobby and sending us to a solo lobby which makes the player having to go through the hassle of joining another public lobby to interact with players again
Ability 5 Messing with level and money
Within my first 10 minutes of playing GTA V Online i was learning all the basics of what i can do and how to do it Tutorial When i was given the chance to finally free roam the GTA V world and do as i please my screen was filled with notifications saying Ive collected 1010 collectablesecrat cash This gave my player 1M of ingame currency and my level jumped from 130 in an instant allowing me to unlock the achievement  reach rank 25 When i had a look at the chat it was one cheater saying your welcome and then leaving the game after promoting where and how to get the hacks This took away the fun for grinding for money and items if they were this easy to obtain with cheats 

NO 3 Public Lobbies
When i bought GTA V i was expecting to run into a couple of bad apples or sweats who player the game seriously mixed in with a couple of nice players who would make it fun but in order to have any fun with the online aspect of GTA V you would have to either play with friends on in a crew only session or find any discord servers which promotes a private server to join without cheaters

NO 4 AntiCheat
This is my first time playing GTA V online and Ive never experienced a game with a terrible anticheat system Until  I see that Rockstar has introduced and implemented a functional anticheat system

Thanks for your cooperation
