Rockstars Grand Theft Auto V is a massive openworld action game that offers an incredible amount of freedom to explore the vast city of Los Santos and surrounding countryside After its initial release in 2013 it still holds up well nearly a decade later as one of the most ambitious and entertaining open world games ever created

GTA V allows you to play as three different protagonists  Michael Franklin and Trevor Each character has their own skillsets and special abilities and you can switch between them at will This gives you a lot of strategic options during missions and allows you to see the story from different perspectives

The sprawling open world is packed with details that make Los Santos feel like a living breathing city There are countless vehicles to drive stunt jumps to make random events to discover and side activities like tennis golf and scuba diving The amount of content is almost overwhelming

Missions provide plenty of overthetop action from large scale heists to street races and shootouts Gunplay feels impactful and driving mechanics are smooth Even mundane activities like customizing cars is enjoyable thanks to the level of depth and options

With amazing writing voice acting and character development GTA Vs story and satire of Southern California life is entertaining from start to finish Though some themes and humor havent aged perfectly its an engaging crime story fueled by greed and a memorable cast of characters

GTA Online has kept the experience feeling fresh for years with new modes and content updates It does have some repetitive grind but playing and wreaking havoc with friends is a total blast

Some gameplay and graphics elements feel a bit dated now but GTA V remains one of the most impressive open world experiences out there The incredible attention to detail paired with exciting action and dark humor makes this a crime saga not to be missed

GTA V Review

Review is after completing the main story missions all side missions finding all collectibles clearing the entire map and achieving 100 completion on single player mode As a side note never cared for multiplayer
hrhr


bStoryb
My favorite GTA game was San Andreas After playing this game my favorite GTA game is San Andreas Yes that didnt change Its hard to compete against Carl Johnsons version of the heros journey Having said that GTA V is an absolute gem in a caliber of its own A diamond of a game I highly encourage gamers to 100 the single player aspect of the game As you explore the game to find all collectibles you will see just how much detail developers integrated into this world Also Space Docker is the ultimate vehicle in the game


bGameplayb
Took me a while to figure out how to do the knife flights correctly for the achievement Other than that the remainder of the gameplay was superb I was however jealous of all the cool vehicles and weapons the developer implemented in GTA Online


bGraphicsb
On a league of their own considering how detailed the world is The only benchmark they need to surpass for the next game is their own


bControlsb
Played on PC with mouse and keyboard Gameplay and gunplay was smooth and responsive 


bSide Missionsb
Completed all of them I had to you see because they were all so good


bMusicSoundtrackVoiceb
Excellent curated selection of songs as usual Voice acting from all 3 main characters was at peak quality


bPerformanceb
Experienced no crashes and the game ran smoothly on my PC which is a midrange PC It did not cause undue heating of the CPU and GPU


How in the world is Rockstar going to surpass this game Yes I know they did Red Dead Redemption 2 afterwards but that game did not have as many moving parts as this game did

Overall Score 1010
good but modders made the experience hell by kicking me from sessions crashing my game multiple times griefing an annoyoing me

Rating 

Ive had the immense pleasure of diving into the world of Grand Theft Auto V for the past five months and I can confidently say that this game is nothing short of a modern gaming masterpiece Rockstar Games has truly outdone themselves with this openworld epic delivering an experience that sets the bar for openworld actionadventure games

Graphics and Visuals 
From the moment I stepped into the fictional city of Los Santos I was awestruck by its breathtaking visuals The attention to detail is astonishing with stunningly realistic character models lifelike environments and a daynight cycle that adds depth and immersion to the world Even after months of gameplay I still find myself stopping to admire the sunrise over the city or the reflections in the rainsoaked streets

Gameplay and Mechanics 
GTA V seamlessly blends a gripping narrative with an openworld playground that encourages exploration and experimentation The three playable protagonists Michael Franklin and Trevor each bring their unique personalities and skills to the table making for a diverse and dynamic gameplay experience The controls are intuitive and the variety of vehicles weapons and activities at your disposal ensures that boredom is a foreign concept in this game

Storyline and Characters 
The narrative in GTA V is an absolute triumph Its not just a crime caper its a thoughtprovoking exploration of the American Dream ambition and morality The three protagonists intertwined stories provide a refreshing perspective on the criminal underworld and the supporting cast of characters is as memorable as they are unpredictable The sharp writing and superb voice acting elevate the storytelling to new heights

Multiplayer 
Grand Theft Auto Online adds another layer of enjoyment to the game Whether youre racing with friends tackling heists or simply causing mayhem in the vast open world the multiplayer mode extends the games longevity indefinitely Frequent updates and a thriving online community ensure that theres always something new to discover

Conclusion
Grand Theft Auto V is an enduring gem in the world of video games Five months into my journey Im still finding new things to do new secrets to uncover and new ways to be amazed by the sheer scale and detail of Los Santos This game represents a high watermark for the industry and is a mustplay for any gamer Rockstar Games commitment to quality is evident in every pixel and the result is nothing short of breathtaking Five months in and I can confidently say that GTA V is the best game Ive ever played If you havent experienced it yet do yourself a favor and dive into this openworld masterpiece You wont be disappointed

Grand Theft Auto V is the most realistic life simulator Ive ever played Forget about those boring sims games where you make friends build houses and go to work In GTA V you can do it all  and then some

Pros

Excellent traffic AI NPCs drive as if theyre on a mission to reenact every action movie car chase
Realistic economics Who knew a life of crime could be so profitable Just dont ask me how I got that yacht
Endless entertainment From playing golf to parachuting off Mount Chiliad theres something for everyone
Trevor Philips Industries  the only workplace that never gets old
Cons

Terrible road rage Its hard to maintain my zenlike calm when my fellow motorists are trying to recreate the next Fast  Furious movie on the freeway
Clothes shopping addiction My character spends more on clothes than I do in real life and Im not even mad about it
Overall if youve ever wondered what its like to be a stunt driver a skydiving pro a billionaire playboy or a criminal mastermind this game has got you covered Just be prepared to lose track of time and your moral compass Ive been a criminal but Ive never been so lawabiding in my life  in a video game of course

Remember its all in good fun and the virtual world of GTA V is a riot Just try not to get too carried away or you might find yourself on the wrong side of the law in real life too

This has got to be the most sucked off game ever There is no reason this game should be as popular as it is Almost everything about this game is bad The controls are so confusing is makes you feel like a toddler who has just been told to pilot an F22 raptor Like why the fuck would middle mouse button open the menu The loading time is so unreasonably long is makes you wonder if they just make it load for that long to mess with their players The game play is mid at best like there are so many other options for games you could play with the same if not better features And one of the main selling points of the game the heists are utter filth found from the deepest depths of the filthiest dump You spend 45 minutes setting it up just only for one civilian to catch a stray and make you lose all your progress and end up making 20 The game also takes up a whopping 100 gigabytes and as expected for the size takes forever yo re install It is also so poorly optimized on steam you have to make a social club account and if you forget that password then its just over for you I guess because the password resetting website crashed every time you enter a new password Only after you do some stupid extra thing you shouldnt have to do you can then reset your password And dont even get me started on how hard it is to make money you feel like you are making good progress and then you realize that the cheapest non shit car is over 1 million dollars plus for some vehicles you need special garages to even buy some of the better things Ever wonder why this game goes on sale for so cheap The only reason I play this game is because my dumb ass friends keep asking me to play it I would much rather do unpaid work than play this game For anyone who is considering buying this game who hasnt gotten it yet and for those who are considering re installing it dont

Title Grand Theft Auto V  An Epic Experience Marred by Load Times Cheaters and Glitches

Grand Theft Auto V GTA V is undoubtedly a modern gaming masterpiece that delivers an exhilarating openworld experience like no other From the sprawling city of Los Santos to the captivating narratives of its three protagonists this game is an actionpacked adventure that has set a new standard in the gaming industry However amidst the praise there are some significant drawbacks that need addressing

First and foremost GTA Vs openworld is an absolute triumph The attention to detail in recreating Los Angeles is aweinspiring and the sheer size of the map is mindboggling Exploring this virtual world is a true joy with an abundance of side activities missions and random encounters that keep players engaged for hours on end

The characters are brilliantly written and performed with Michael Franklin and Trevor each bringing their unique charm and complexity to the story The narrative is a rollercoaster ride filled with memorable moments and unexpected twists making it one of the best in the series

The games visuals are stunning especially on more powerful hardware The attention to detail in the environment character models and vehicle designs is nothing short of remarkable The soundtrack perfectly complements the atmosphere featuring an eclectic mix of music that suits every mood

However the experience takes a hit when it comes to load times Its baffling that even on highend systems players often find themselves staring at loading screens for what feels like an eternity This issue disrupts the otherwise immersive experience and can be incredibly frustrating especially when transitioning between story missions and online play

Speaking of online play GTA Online has its share of problems The presence of cheaters and hackers in online lobbies has plagued the game since its inception Its disheartening to see players exploit the games mechanics to gain an unfair advantage ruining the experience for others Rockstars efforts to combat these issues have been inconsistent at best leaving legitimate players to suffer the consequences

Furthermore frequent glitches and bugs continue to mar the GTA V experience These can range from minor inconveniences like mission markers disappearing to gamebreaking issues that force players to restart missions or even the entire game Its frustrating to encounter these problems in a game that has been on the market for years and has received numerous updates

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V remains a gaming masterpiece that deserves praise for its openworld design storytelling and attention to detail However the long load times persistent issues with cheaters in online lobbies and frequent glitches detract from what could be a flawless experience While its certainly worth playing for its strengths its disheartening to see these issues persist in a game of such high caliber Rockstar Games should prioritize addressing these concerns to ensure that GTA V continues to shine as one of the greatest openworld games of all time

I wish there was a way to review the single player and multiplayer separately The single player is missing lots of things that you expect from a modern title mostly because the single player is about 10 years old at this point literally 9 days away from a 10 year anniversary as I write this But otherwise the single player game is about everything youve come to expect from a great developer like Rockstar The multiplayer game is about everything you expect from an absolutely scumbag horrible publisher like TakeTwo Interactive The multiplayer is bugged as shit has almost no incentive to play filled with griefers and hackers oh sorry modders is 10 years old and TakeTwo have literally said they dont want you playing their game if you dont buy shark cards
Im just going to go ahead and say dont buy this game Even for the single player its a bit old and there are better single player games out these days ie Witcher 3 Fallout etc The multiplayer is a horrendous piece of dog shit that is so obviously tacked on by TakeTwo as a way to try to milk this game for all the money they can get so they dont have to fund a new GTA game for as long as possible

The real takeaway from GTA5 should really be that you should be extremely wary of GTA6 Im sure Rockstar will do an absolutely amazing job on developing the game and the single player campaign but TakeTwo is going to ruin it like they do everything else Hell look at the state of KSP2  that is TakeTwo really pushing that game into early access before its ready  And remember TakeTwo wanted to shut down ALL mods for KSP1 TakeTwo is a horrendous piece of shit publisher right up there with the likes of Electronic Arts but doesnt get quite the flak that Electronic Arts gets because TakeTwo mostly works on things that arent quite as mainstream for PC or for things that are mostly console titles like GTA

Avoid GTA5 and Id avoid buying GTA6 until well after release when it starts going on sale maybe not even then  lets see the reviews first

A solid wellwritten game you start out as a heist member where in a suddenly turn of events things go wrong and you and your buddy Brad are sniped 
Fast forward a decade later you play as a exFamilies Gang member named Franklin Clinton repoing a car for Simeon Yeterian 
You are eventually tasked to repo a car from a kid named Jimmy De Santa and sure enough you get a handgun pointed to your dome 
Turns out that man you played as Michael Townley is now Michael De Santa 
who faked his death during the heist to enter a Witness Protection Program 
Smash into the car shop window Michael pays you for a job well done 
The games events then spontaneously kick off from that and propels the plot
      
There is a variety of activists to do in Los Santos or Blaine County such as events Strangers and Freaks Activities and some events get your new heist members for future heists The gunplay in the game is linear but smooth and intuitive 
The special abilities the trio have are unique and engaging
 It helps you to have an edge over the various enemies in the world such as the Los Santos Police Department 
the Ballas etc 
Activities are somewhat repetitive and boring after a while 
The Strangers and Freaks mission is a mixed bag some of the characters are fun and engaging 
while others are monotone and annoying 
Tasked with different tasks based on the Stranger you are dealing with and what they want

The game in my playthrough which is somewhat rushed but also doing all the events and a quarter of the Strangers and Freaks missions the entire length of the game took me about 392 hours to beat A felt like a real ride with a sense of achievement based on the 1 of 3 endings you choose That will be something you will have to find out in your playthrough 

8510 would strongly recommend this game for its singleplayer experience alone not so much for online because of the rampant hackers in lobbies

Amazing game with great assets A lot of things to unlock in the Story Mode but also a great experience while playing in Online Mode Definitely a game youll be playing for a long time as grinding everything costs a lot of time This does match up with very good results though so its definitely worth the playtime

I recommend the game for the story mode which is the quintessential GTA V experience that weve all known for the last 10 years 

This game is probably the most fun driving experience Ive had outside of dedicated racing games and every other game falls short when compared to this one

HOWEVER ONLINE MODE

As a new player you should be super aware that modders in lobbies are very common And most have a superiority complex About 60 of the time its fine unless you try to get in a fight with one in which case you will have a bad time being stuck in a death loop Best way to avoid that is to just type in chat that youre going to go AFK and stop giving them the satisfaction they give up super quickly or just move to a new lobby of course

Even ignoring modders as a new player its pretty hard to get to the good content which is all the expensive stuff in the game this truly is the American dream which Rockstar has made millions from over the last 10 years I used to play the game on console so Ive had an easier time getting used to it however 90 of modders are selfish but occasionally youll get random modders wholl just give you a tonne of XP and money which can help you skip a lot of grinding

If you ever reach the point you get a lot of items good cars guns apartment etc its pretty satisfying

Online mode is full of modders usually fine until they decide to grief you in which case you move to a new lobby you can still have fun in the game though theres a lot to do and sometimes its kinda overwhelming as a new player if youre lucky a nice modder will just give u money and levels and then you can actually enjoy the game its a slick experience when you have a lot of the stuff otherwise its a pain to grind

Assalamu alaykum dear friends and gamers Allow me to share my thoughts on the captivating world of Grand Theft Auto V This game set in the sprawling streets of Los Santos reminds me of the diverse landscapes and cultures of our Middle Eastern lands a blend of tradition and modernity

In Grand Theft Auto V players find themselves navigating the intricate web of crime and ambition much like the stories of ancient civilizations and the great caliphates of the past The game offers a rich tapestry of characters each with their own motivations and desires mirroring the complexities of human nature that have fascinated our scholars for centuries

The virtual Los Santos a sprawling metropolis mirrors the bustling cities of our region with its towering skyscrapers and crowded streets The attention to detail in this game is akin to the intricate mosaic work found in our historical mosques every pixel a testament to the dedication of the creators

One cannot ignore the exhilarating vehicular chases and heists that form the core of the gameplay As we navigate the dangerous criminal underbelly of Los Santos its as if we are embarking on a thrilling desert caravan journey braving the elements and facing the unknown The rush of adrenaline is akin to the heartpounding feeling one might experience during a challenging pilgrimage to Mecca

Yet it is crucial to acknowledge that Grand Theft Auto V also touches upon the consequences of our actions a reflection of the teachings of Islam The choices made by the characters and by extension the player have repercussions that resonate throughout the games narrative It serves as a reminder of the importance of ethical conduct and the consequences of ones deeds in line with our faiths teachings

The sound design of the game with its blend of Middle Easterninspired music and modern beats creates a unique atmosphere that resonates with our cultural heritage while immersing us in the world of Los Santos

However it is essential to approach Grand Theft Auto V with a discerning eye and a commitment to the values of Islam The game does explore themes of violence and criminality and it is crucial to maintain a sense of balance and responsibility in our interactions with it

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V is a remarkable experience that like the tapestry of Islam weaves together a multitude of elements into a vibrant and engaging whole It invites us to explore the human condition and navigate the complexities of a dynamic world reminding us of the everevolving nature of our own lives Approach it with wisdom and reflection and you may find it to be a thoughtprovoking journey through the streets of Los Santos Peace be upon you all

Grand Theft Auto V is a true masterpiece that continues to captivate players with its deep and immersive gaming universe Its not just a game its an experience that will leave a mark on your gaming memory

Right from the start the game draws you in with its multitude of possibilities and a dynamically alive world From the sprawling city to rural landscapes and untamed nature every corner of the virtual world springs to life before your eyes You can freely explore interact with characters and the environment and of course embark on incredible heists and adventures

The seamless transition between playable characters adds a unique dimension to the gameplay Each of the main protagonists has their own distinct story skills and personality allowing you to fully immerse yourself in diverse aspects of the plot and gameplay

The story campaign in GTA V captivates with its intrigue and unexpected twists Youll encounter thrilling missions that provide an adrenaline rush and serve as a true test of your agility and strategic thinking

The multiplayer mode GTA Online is a sandbox for creativity and fun You can create your own gangs participate in competitions races and join a vast community of players to collaboratively plan elaborate heists or simply enjoy quality time together

Equally impressive is the technical aspect of the game The graphics animations and sound design come together to create an incredibly realistic world that fully engulfs you in the gaming universe

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V remains an undeniable classic in the world of video games Its deep world captivating narrative multifaceted characters and the opportunity for online interaction make it a mustplay for both seasoned gamers and newcomers Dont miss the chance to dive into this unique gaming world and become a part of its history

GTA Games have one thing in common Its storytelling And GTA 5s story was great as usual The graphic The mechanic There wasnt much to badmouth Variety of new cars And I loved the online It gave me and others a chance to play with friends and make friends But just like others I didnt like it when most of the cars were erased from online shops But lets get back to story mode I liked Trevor the most His character indepth was amazing Hes cruel but not a psychopath He loves his mom and values loyalty which is shown in Ending B When Franklin asks for Trevors help to kill Michael Trevor refuses instantly But when it is Ending A Michael agrees It tells that Michael values his family more than anything He tells it on some occasions as well And as for Franklin Hes the street man who wants to leave that life behind But he just upped the game From the interactions and everything from these three characters I thought Trevor was the muscle Michael was the leader Franklin was the peacekeeper Bonus Lester was the brain And Theres more to the story than what I explained Other than just playing the online I suggest you play the story mode as well But the most important part in the story In my own conclusion Was the three protagonists Theyre all in the end doing what theyre doing to achieve a better life And I think I rumbled too long xD

A Bumpy Ride

Rating 

So I just have to vent about my time with GTA 5  especially the online part Strap in folks because this isnt going to be a joyride

I dont know from where to start but here we go  First of all the online mayhem 
GTA 5 online More like GTA Cheaters Paradise The place is swarming with players using mod menus making it feel like a lawless wasteland Rockstars effort to clean this mess Well its nonexistent Plus the ingame prices are so absurdly high a car that you can buy for 100K is worth of 4M  Recent updates Yeah theyve made the game feel like a wild circus not in a good way

Server are too slow buggy and laggy
The servers are terrible and buggy Trying to enjoy a heist mission Prepare for a chaotic mess of crashes and glitches Its almost like they want you to give up

and dont get me started with the customer support its a nightmare in Itself

My online account had a problem that basically kept me from playing When I finally reached out to their support it felt like shouting into the void Response times were painfully long and when they did reply their help was about as useful as a chocolate teapot did you try to delete and reinstall the game To top it all off they had the audacity to mark my ticket as resolved when in reality it was anything but resolved Talk about frustrating

so far the only thing I liked is the story mode
The only saving grace in this GTA 5 ordeal is the story mode Its a genuine masterpiece with no cheaters in sight to ruin the fun If youre thinking about diving into this game Id strongly advise sticking to the story mode and steering clear of the online chaos GTA 5s story mode is a gem but the online mode is a wild mess of cheaters walletdraining prices and a customer support team that needs a serious upgrade 

Rockstar if youre listening its high time to fix these issues and give us the game we all deserve Disgusting company that doesnt respect its customers

Ive been playing GTAV on and off since it was first released and Ive been playing a lot more recently since they opened up most of the missions to play in a private session I basically stopped playing for a few years because it was impossible for me anyway to find a session where other players would moreorless leave me alone to do what I wanted to do Since they will now let me play most missions in a private session its been great If I could find a few friends to play with  a bit difficult for me as Im an old guy who plays mostly in the afternoons in the eastern United States  Id be interested in doing the Heists Oh well maybe one day 

The Story is much different from the Online play and both are fun I did finish the Story I didnt get every last achievement but thats okay and now I play almost exclusively online Note that this game deserves it Mature rating mostly for the language but also for some of the innuendo and some artifacts 

The game mechanics are great Id say theyre among the best Ive seen in any game It would be nice to see RockStar use the same mechanics in a different story in a different setting Hint hint

If you enjoy FPS games with varied missions and mission types open world play and great game mechanics  and you dont mind the language particularly in the Story version  I highly recommend this game

My name is Walter Hartwell White I live at 308 Negra Arroyo Lane Albuquerque New Mexico 87104 This is my confession If youre watching this tape Im probably dead murdered by my brotherinlaw Hank Schrader Hank has been building a meth empire for over a year now and using me as his chemist Shortly after my 50th birthday Hank came to me with a rather shocking proposition He asked that I use my chemistry knowledge to cook methamphetamine which he would then sell using his connections in the drug world Connections that he made through his career with the DEA I was astounded I I always thought that Hank was a very moral man and I was thrown confused but I was also particularly vulnerable at the time something he knew and took advantage of I was reeling from a cancer diagnosis that was poised to bankrupt my family Hank took me on a ride along and showed me just how much money even a small meth operation could make And I was weak I didnt want my family to go into financial ruin so I agreed Every day I think back at that moment with regret I quickly realized that I was in way over my head and Hank had a partner a man named Gustavo Fring a businessman Hank essentially sold me into servitude to this man and when I tried to quit Fring threatened my family I didnt know where to turn
Eventually Hank and Fring had a falling out From what I can gather Hank was always pushing for a greater share of the business to which Fring flatly refused to give him and things escalated Fring was able to arrange uh I guess I guess you call it a hit on my brotherinlaw and failed but Hank was seriously injured and I wound up paying his medical bills which amounted to a little over 177000 Upon recovery Hank was bent on revenge working with a man named Hector Salamanca he plotted to kill Fring and did so In fact the bomb that he used was built by me and he gave me no option in it I have often contemplated suicide but Im a coward I wanted to go to the police but I was frightened Hank had risen in the ranks to become the head of the Albuquerque DEA and about that time to keep me in line he took my children from me For 3 months he kept them My wife who up until that point had no idea of my criminal activities was horrified to learn what I had done why Hank had taken our children We were scared I was in Hell I hated myself for what I had brought upon my family Recently I tried once again to quit to end this nightmare and in response he gave me this I cant take this anymore I live in fear every day that Hank will kill me or worse hurt my family I All I could think to do was to make this video in hope that the world will finally see this man for what he really is

This game is fun  I like it  But a recent update has rendered it unplayable for me

Before a recent update Linux and Windows support was flawless  Now Grand Theft Auto V is not playable for me on either Linux Proton or Windows native

On the former I experienced it occasionally loading and working other times it doesnt  It would often get past Processing Vulkan Shaders and then not launch the Rockstar Games Launcher  Some other times it would crash after the loading screen at about 23 stars in the topright  On very rare occasions after restarting Steam and letting Vulkan shaders process it would sometimes actually launch

For the latter it was fine until changing my graphics settings at which point the game loaded and played at less than 1fps where I was unable to change any settings back at all  On Linux with Proton which virtualizes the game I was usually around 7080fps  Main menu screens being impossible to navigate makes no sense here

A few hours from initially writing this review GTA Online is able to pass through all the loading screens but then immediately crashes when getting ingame  Fun

I understand that not all users will experience the aforementioned issues but it might be something to be wary of especially if you are looking into running the game through Proton

Along with those I still have some other gripes with the game

The menus also feel clunky and incomplete and some options are located in hard to find places

GTA Online lobbies are infested with cheaters all the time  going anywhere but a private or friends only session is simply not a fun experience

GTA Onlines loading times are also extremely long a lot of the time  sometimes taking 23 minutes to get into a lobby  This could be an internet issue but Id describe my internet to be pretty average and alright

This game is still fun once you get things going and I would like to recommend it if I was able to get it working a larger amount of the time  playing GTA Online with my friends is one of my favourite things to do an I enjoy even just being in a lobby and VC with them with eachother occasionally jumping in and bombing one another and everyone bursting into laughter

And even playing solo is still a fun experience at least for me stealing cars and shooting guns is fun

PS If anyone can help me fix my mentioned issues then feel free to reach out

EDIT Thought itd be worth mentioning
Intel i512400f
AMD RX 6600XT
16GB RAM

EDIT2 I have no idea what I did but it works now  I think its because Windows randomly decided to update and possibly did my graphics drivers  Could have been an issue with that  Still very strange

I have way more hours in GTAV than what is shown on my account as I have played since day 1 of its launch on other platforms Thats part of the problem Ill leave out the details but the reasons I say to avoid the online part is because its the most toxic multiplayer game in existence today It started out good when they stayed within the bounds of the GTA universe but once they introduced game breaking flying bikescarssubsnuclear missile heistsetc it was clear they only cared about the money 

Heists werent even in the game at first and when they did get put in they werent terribly unrealistic But thats when RockstarRS started their turn to greed and predatory shark card pushing They nerfed payouts for nearly everything while increasing the cost of everything in an attempt to slow down players getting too much money Players could buy stuff with all the money RS was paying out in missionsheists and that didnt make people need to buy shark cards So they just kept adding more stuff at ridiculous prices while also requiring ridiculous storage facilities for these new vehicles and you couldnt even do any new heists unless you owned a certain vehiclebusiness thus ultimately making the official grind to get these things a pita Or just as they expected people started buying shark cards to compensate for their time which just spiraled out of control into an unrealistic experience thats so out of touch with the original release RS just said oh well its a different universe that takes place before the events of single player BS The reason they havent made GTA6 sooner is because the cow still had a LOT of milk left 

I dont want the other companies seeing the success of RS as a sign to do the same treatment to their games Sure youll make money but youll lose a lot of players leading you to end up like RS pandering to whales that keep the game afloat

Listen up you crazy bunch Grand Theft Auto V aint just a game its a fullon crazy ride thatll have your heart pounding like you just downed a jug of adrenaline Im talkin bout a world where you can hijack cars burn rubber like a maniac and unleash havoc like a bat outta hell And let me tell you its a damn blast

From the moment you dive into Los Santos youre smack dab in the middle of a chaotic playground thats fit for folks like me  misfits lunatics and downright insane individuals Michael Franklin and that wild card Trevor bring a whole new meaning to the word chaos and believe me things escalate pretty damn quick

You get behind the wheel of a stolen ride slam that gas pedal to the floor and the rush hits you like a shot of adrenaline straight to the veins And lets talk heists  planning and executing those with a bunch of screwballs by your side Its like conducting an orchestra of chaos and Im the goddamn conductor

Los Santos man This open world is a masterpiece of madness You got everything from pristine beaches to grimy back alleys all ready for your brand of mayhem And the attention to detail Its like they read my mind You can be a pilot go play some damn golf or raise hell in a strip club Its a world tailormade for a guy like me

The story Oh the story is a rollercoaster thatll throw you for loops you never saw coming Betrayal lunacy and plot twists thatll make your head spin And those random nutjobs you meet along the way Helping some wacko launch his druggedup submarine Yeah thats just another day in Los Santos

Graphics Sounds Radio stations pumping out twisted tunes Its like being inside a chaotic fever dream The only thing missing is the smell of burnt rubber and gunpowder And damn it I love every second of it Its like living out the craziest fantasies without the realworld mess

So if youre looking for a taste of the wild side if you want to dive headfirst into the lunacy and unpredictability then Grand Theft Auto V is your golden ticket Its a wild journey thatll have you grinning like a madman cursing at the screen and maybe questioning your sanity  all in the best way possible Embrace the madness you beautiful maniacs

Peanut Butter Cookies

Ingredients
1 cup unsalted butter
1 cup crunchy peanut butter
1 cup white sugar
1 cup packed brown sugar
2 large eggs
2 ½ cups allpurpose flour
1 ½ teaspoons baking soda
1 teaspoon baking powder
½ teaspoon salt
Directions
Beat butter peanut butter white sugar and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth beat in eggs
Sift flour baking soda baking powder and salt into a separate bowl stir into butter mixture until dough is just combined Chill cookie dough in the refrigerator for 1 hour
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F 190 degrees C
Roll dough into 1inch balls and place 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets Flatten each ball with a fork making a crisscross pattern
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden about 10 minutes Cool on the baking sheets briefly before removing to a wire rack to cool completely

Grand Theft Auto V GTA V is an extraordinary masterpiece that stands as a testament to the openworld actionadventure genre With its sprawling meticulously crafted game world engaging storyline and endless opportunities for mayhem GTA V offers an unparalleled experience that continues to captivate players years after its release

Set in the fictional city of Los Santos a stunning reimagining of Los Angeles GTA V introduces players to a trio of protagonists Michael a retired bank robber seeking a new life Franklin a streetsavvy hustler looking to escape his surroundings and Trevor a volatile and unpredictable criminal The characterswitching mechanic allows players to seamlessly switch between these three individuals adding depth to the narrative and offering unique perspectives on the games unfolding events

One of the most remarkable aspects of GTA V is its breathtakingly detailed open world Los Santos is a living breathing entity teeming with activities NPCs and surprises around every corner From towering skyscrapers to sunsoaked beaches the citys diverse environments offer a sense of immersion that is truly aweinspiring The games attention to detail whether in the bustling city streets or the vast countryside is a testament to Rockstars dedication to creating a rich and vibrant game world

The storyline of GTA V is a rollercoaster of heists betrayals and unexpected alliances The interwoven narratives of Michael Franklin and Trevor provide an engaging and wellpaced experience that keeps players invested in the outcome The writing is sharp darkly humorous and often satirical tackling social and political issues with a dose of Rockstars signature irreverence

Gameplay in GTA V is a harmonious blend of action driving and exploration The sheer variety of activities is staggering  from highstakes heists and intense shootouts to leisurely sports races and even simple pastimes like golf and tennis The driving mechanics are polished and responsive and the wide array of vehicles each with its own distinct handling adds to the immersive experience

GTA Online the games multiplayer component extends the life of GTA V even further It provides a massive openworld playground for players to engage in coop missions competitive modes and openended chaos with friends or strangers The constant updates and additions keep the experience fresh and exciting offering an everevolving online world to explore

Graphically GTA V still holds up remarkably well showcasing intricate details in character models vehicles and environments The games soundtrack radio stations and voice acting are all topnotch contributing to the overall atmosphere and immersion

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V is a masterclass in openworld gaming combining an engaging narrative a vibrant and diverse game world and a plethora of activities that cater to every type of player Its longevity is a testament to its enduring appeal and even years after its initial release GTA V remains an essential title that stands as a shining example of Rockstar Games unparalleled craftsmanship

Why not use secondary missions to expand on these characters Their mindsets their history their relationships with other individuals I wanted to understand them better I perceived the mcs I just wanted to get more out of these three
I wanted to get a clearer picture of Franklins hood life his bond with Lamar with his ex with his childhood friends there was enough structure for that to happen instead what we got was futile missions who are mostly running jokes or their existence is there only to get a mechanic from the game which is fine  we can have those but we need the build up missions also they are essential for a story based game such as this one
I hoped to view additional content of Michaels family life to spend time with Jimmy Tracey Amanda theyre nice kids and I disliked the fact that we went with the full on stereotype characters
Same for Trevor I craved to watch into his head so to speak  to make proper sense out of him
My point is this game is too short and its short for the reason that we have too many meaningless missions that do not shape your protagonists those quests are forgettable

Grand Theft Auto V is an exceptional openworld action adventure game that offers an immersive visually stunning and incredibly fun gaming experience Developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games GTAV on PC builds upon the success of its console counterparts with enhanced graphics a wider variety of content and improved overall performance

In addition to its visually striking environments GTAV also boasts an extensive and engaging story line that follows three main protagonists as they navigate through a world of crime corruption and intrigue The games narrative is expertly woven together with a cast of memorable characters delivering a captivating and emotionally charged experience that will keep players invested from start to finish

Game play in GTAV on PC is incredibly smooth and responsive thanks to the games advanced graphics settings and optimisation for highperformance hardware Players can expect an exceptional level of control over their characters and vehicles allowing them to fully explore and exploit the vast open world that GTAV has to offer

Grand Theft Auto V is a masterful achievement in gaming that expertly blends engaging game play mechanics with an incredibly detailed and visually stunning openworld environment With its expansive content impressive visuals and exceptional storytelling GTAV on PC stands as one of the most compelling and memorable gaming experiences available today

Title A Magnificent Urban Playground  Grand Theft Auto V Review

Rating  55

Grand Theft Auto V GTA V stands as a monumental achievement in the realm of openworld gaming offering an incredibly detailed and sprawling virtual representation of a vibrant and chaotic metropolis Rockstar Games masterpiece released in 2013 continues to captivate players with its intricate storytelling diverse characters and an expansive sandbox environment that pushes the boundaries of what an openworld game can achieve

From the moment you step into the sunsoaked streets of Los Santos it becomes apparent that GTA V is an exercise in worldbuilding perfection The city is alive with an abundance of activities and attractions that cater to a wide range of play styles Whether youre an adrenaline junkie looking to engage in highspeed police chases a strategic planner orchestrating elaborate heists or simply an explorer soaking in the urban sprawl GTA V offers something for everyone

The games narrative is a tour de force interweaving the stories of three protagonists  Michael Franklin and Trevor  whose lives and ambitions intersect in unexpected ways The character development is exceptional and Rockstars storytelling prowess is on full display as they delve into the complexities of their personalities backgrounds and motivations Each character is fully realized making it easy to invest emotionally in their individual journeys

System Specifications

RTX 3060
60 Watt of Power
6 GB VRAM

Ryzen 7 5800HX
16 GB DDR4 RAM
512 GB SSD

For me Grand Theft Auto Vs extraordinary scope is summed up in two favourite moments One is from a midgame mission in which I flew a plane into another plane fought the crew hijacked the thing and then parachuted out and watched it crash into the sea to escape death at the hands of incoming military fighter jets Another time whilst driving around in an offroad buggy I got distracted by something that looked like a path up one of the San Andreas mountains Turns out it was a path and I spent 15 minutes following to the summit where I nearly ran over a group of hikers Typical one of them yelled at me as if he nearly gets run over by a rogue ATV on top of a mountain every time he goes on a hike

I could go on like this for ages GTA V has an abundance of such moments big and small that make San Andreas  the city of Los Santos and its surrounding areas  feel like a living world where anything can happen It both gives you tremendous freedom to explore an astonishingly wellrealised world and tells a story thats gripping thrilling and darkly comic It is a leap forward in narrative sophistication for the series and theres no mechanical element of the gameplay that hasnt been improved over Grand Theft Auto IV Its immediately noticeable that the cover system is more reliable and the autoaim less touchy The cars handle less like their tires are made of butter and stick better to the road though their exaggerated handling still leaves plenty of room for spectacular wipeouts And at long last Rockstar has finally slain one of its most persistent demons mission checkpointing ensuring that you never have to do a long tedious drive six times when you repeatedly fail a mission ever again

I have been a fan of the Grand Theft Auto series for years and Grand Theft Auto V absolutely exceeded my expectations This game offers an unparalleled openworld experience that keeps you hooked from the very beginning

The first thing that struck me was the incredibly detailed and immersive world of Los Santos The city is bustling with life from the diverse pedestrians going about their business to the stunning landscapes that seamlessly blend urban and natural environments Every street corner has its own story to tell making exploration an absolute joy

The characters in GTA 5 are some of the most memorable and welldeveloped in gaming history Michael Franklin and Trevor each bring their own unique personalities and backgrounds to the table creating a perfect dynamic within the storyline The voice acting and character animations are topnotch making every interaction feel genuine and engaging

What truly sets GTA 5 apart is its storytelling The intertwining narratives of the three protagonists keep you invested in every twist and turn of the plot The missions are diverse and exciting ranging from highoctane heists to heartwarming moments that reveal the characters deeper sides The writing is sharp witty and often satirical offering both thoughtprovoking social commentary and laughoutloud humor

The attention to detail in Grand Theft Auto V is astounding From the realistic physics and driving mechanics to the bustling traffic and pedestrians the world feels alive in every way Whether youre engaging in a highspeed chase participating in a street race or simply soaking in the beautiful sunset over the ocean the level of immersion is unparalleled

And lets not forget about GTA Online The multiplayer aspect of the game adds a whole new layer of fun and competition Whether youre teaming up with friends for heists or engaging in wild and creative game modes theres always something new to explore and experience

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V is an absolute masterpiece that has set a new standard for openworld gaming Rockstar Games has once again delivered an unforgettable experience that combines gripping storytelling stunning visuals and boundless opportunities for exploration If youre looking for a game that will keep you entertained for hours on end GTA 5 is an absolute mustplay

0 Stars GTA used to be a really good franchise but R has proven their incompetence by an absolute lack of attention to fixing bugs or preventing hacks Most recently none of the in game menus work so youre unable to complete missions call for vehicles or utilize anything that isnt on the in game phone Loading still takes obscenely forever even for a 10 year old game That is when it actually does load between whatever areas it has to load Too often you end up staring at a garage door trying to walk into a garage area or playing cloud simulator waiting for a load back into the world from a race or mission  Instead of fixing issues like this which have plagued the game from DAY 1 R has instead focused on bringing new characters missions vehicles and weapons into the game It doesnt matter how much content the game has if its not playable Even when the game is running properly online griefers run rampant with glitchers hackers and exploiters to prevent even simple enjoyable gameplay It always deteriorates into a PvP match instead of an openended world where people can play together R has never bothered to institute server options to prevent PvP outside of a ghost mode which makes it impossible for you to wield weapons thereby impossible to complete missions Yes nobody can kill you in this mode but you cant play the game either R has ruined what used to be an amazing immersive series with an endless quest for profit

h1Singleplayerh1
The singleplayer is great The missions are fun and hold up well after all these years I think the problem is the story The protagonists are great but the antagonists leave a lot to be desired There isnt a villain like Dmitri Rascalov Officer Tenpenny Dutch or Micah Its a more vague thing like Michaels problems So you hop from minor antagonist to minor antagonist until the story ends because Michaels arc is finally completed Im not sure it works from a climatic point of view
The gameplay feels evolved from GTA IV the animations are much smoother the graphics are better the world overall feels more sophisticated and more populated there is simply just more content This is not without its drawbacks however Some things have been scaled down like the physics simulations in shooting and driving and the damage model to cars I dont know if it was due to game performance or not but since this game was made for the PS3 I guess they couldnt fit all the new things without taking some old things out first

h1Onlineh1
The online is very fun with friends If you play in a public session you can count on some griefing some hacking giving you money so R bans you some funny guy crashing your game but if you play private sessions with friends its very enjoyable 
I like exploring all the content added to the game over the course of these 10 years The first heists are a bit dated now but the Casino Heist Doomsday and Cayo Perico are great It shows R learned what works and what doesnt
But you dont need these things to have fun I enjoy doing things like Top Geartype challenges in places where you dont really go in the story so you have a lot to explore before you feel like you need to buy expansion content

h1Microtransactionsh1
GTA Online has these microtransactions called shark cards People complain the expansions are very grindy because they feel R wants you to buy them I agree It feels like they made them with the following options in mind
 A Buy a shark card so you purchase the propertycaretc and its upgrades  the expansion is fun and yields good ingame money so you can buy more things and have more fun
 B Grind to purchase the thing then grind some more so you can purchase the upgrades which make the property profitable not as fun

Same thing with cars and houses In Midnight Club LA R sold car packs for 299 now they sell cars for a million GTA This gives you the option to pay with your time instead of only your wallet

Nobody tells you about this its very subconscious If R went with option A and sold the expansionsDLC on the side people wouldnt complain but they probably wouldnt care either or call the game P2W so I feel like it worked out okay

Grand Theft Auto V is an absolute masterpiece that has captivated gamers around the world with its unparalleled blend of gripping storytelling breathtaking visuals and a dynamic openworld environment that offers endless possibilities As a dedicated player and enthusiast I can confidently say that GTA V stands as a shining testament to the incredible achievements of the gaming industry

From the moment you step foot into the sprawling metropolis of Los Santos youre immediately immersed in a living breathing world that feels incredibly alive The attention to detail is nothing short of astonishing from the bustling streets teeming with pedestrians to the meticulously designed interiors of various buildings Each nook and cranny of the city exudes authenticity and realism making it a joy to explore and experience

One of the standout features of GTA V is its engrossing storyline Rockstar Games has outdone themselves by weaving together the lives of three distinct protagonists  Michael Franklin and Trevor  in a narrative that is both compelling and emotionally charged The characters are multifaceted each bringing their own unique perspectives and motivations to the table Watching their stories unfold and intertwine is an experience that leaves a lasting impact making you genuinely care about their fates

Beyond the main storyline GTA V offers an astounding array of activities to keep players engaged for countless hours Whether youre indulging in highstakes heists that require meticulous planning partaking in adrenalinepumping races across land sea and air or simply enjoying the laidback pastimes like tennis golf and yoga theres something for every kind of player

The online component Grand Theft Auto Online elevates the game even further providing an expansive multiplayer playground that invites you to team up with friends or compete against others in a wide range of activities The continuous updates and content additions from Rockstar ensure that the experience remains fresh and exciting keeping players coming back for more

Visually GTA V is a masterpiece The level of detail in the graphics especially on modern hardware is simply breathtaking The world comes alive with stunningly realistic lighting weather effects and meticulously crafted environments The attention to detail extends to the character models vehicles and every facet of the games design contributing to an immersive and visually captivating experience

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V is a triumph in game design storytelling and openworld exploration Its unparalleled attention to detail engrossing narrative and wealth of content make it a mustplay title for gamers of all kinds Rockstar Games has delivered a true masterpiece that has set a new standard for openworld gaming and its an experience that no gamer should miss

h1Grand Theft Auto V  A Dizzying Descent into Gratuitous Violence and Societal Decayh1

Grand Theft Auto V GTA V stands as a prime example of a game that prioritizes shock value and gratuitous violence over meaningful storytelling and responsible gameplay While the series has garnered a massive following for its openworld environments and sandbox gameplay GTA V takes the worst aspects of its predecessors and amplifies them to an alarming degree creating a virtual playground that revels in immoral behavior and contributes to a troubling cultural landscape

From the outset GTA V showcases a narrative that glorifies criminality and glamorizes antisocial behavior The protagonists are a trio of morally bankrupt individuals each embroiled in a web of crime violence and corruption While the concept of playing as antiheroes is not inherently problematic GTA V crosses a line by portraying their actions as humorous and entertaining rather than exploring the consequences of their choices This lack of nuance and depth undermines any potential for meaningful character development reducing the story to a series of shockingly violent and exploitative set pieces

One of the most concerning aspects of GTA V is its unrelenting focus on violence and degradation The game offers players a staggering array of weapons to wreak havoc upon the game world from firearms and explosives to melee weapons This arsenal is used not just against rival gangs or law enforcement but also against innocent pedestrians and bystanders who are treated as little more than collateral damage The games missions often involve acts of brutality from torture sequences to heinous acts of cruelty further reinforcing the idea that violence is not only acceptable but also integral to progressing in the game

Furthermore GTA Vs openworld environment encourages players to engage in rampant destruction and chaos without any meaningful consequences The games mechanics actively reward players for causing mayhem such as earning money from committing crimes and evading the police This encourages a toxic cycle of behavior that normalizes criminality and recklessness undermining any semblance of ethical gameplay

The games treatment of women is particularly troubling perpetuating harmful stereotypes and objectification Female characters are often reduced to onedimensional roles existing solely for the purpose of providing sexual gratification or as mere plot devices The pervasive misogyny extends to the games humor which frequently relies on offensive and degrading jokes that reinforce harmful attitudes toward women

Beyond its narrative and thematic concerns GTA V also suffers from technical issues and a lack of innovation The games character models and animations appear outdated and stiff failing to match the level of graphical fidelity expected from a modern title The openworld environment while expansive often feels lifeless and devoid of meaningful interactions leading to a sense of emptiness and repetitiveness The online component Grand Theft Auto Online is plagued with microtransactions and a persistent grind that favors players willing to spend real money to progress further contributing to a sense of exploitation and unfairness

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V exemplifies a disturbing trend in the gaming industry where shock value and gratuitous violence take precedence over responsible storytelling and thoughtful gameplay The games glorification of criminal behavior exploitation of vulnerable themes and overall lack of accountability contribute to a toxic gaming culture that normalizes antisocial actions and undermines the potential for meaningful experiences Rather than pushing boundaries in a positive direction GTA V succumbs to the worst impulses of its creators resulting in a game that is more harmful than entertaining As a reflection of societal values and cultural impact GTA V stands as a stark reminder of the need for responsible and thoughtful game design that prioritizes the wellbeing of players and the broader gaming community

Grand Theft Auto V GTA 5 stands as an unparalleled masterpiece in the world of gaming delivering an immersive experience that has set new standards for openworld gameplay Rockstar Games has truly outdone themselves with this installment showcasing their expertise in storytelling game mechanics and worldbuilding As a devoted player I can confidently award GTA 5 a welldeserved 5star rating

The first aspect that strikes players is the meticulously crafted world of Los Santos and Blaine County The level of detail is astonishing with every nook and cranny teeming with life from bustling city streets to serene countryside landscapes The sheer scope of the map coupled with the seamless transition between urban and rural environments creates a living breathing world that feels genuine and alive

The games narrative is another standout feature The interwoven stories of three distinct protagonists  Michael Franklin and Trevor  bring a refreshing dynamic to the traditional GTA formula Each character has their own unique background motivations and quirks adding layers of complexity to the storyline Rockstars signature satire and social commentary are wellpresented making the narrative both engaging and thoughtprovoking

Gameplay mechanics in GTA 5 are nothing short of exceptional The driving mechanics strike a perfect balance between realism and fun ensuring that vehicular mayhem remains as entertaining as ever Shooting mechanics are smooth and responsive enhancing the actionpacked sequences that the series is renowned for The addition of heists adds an extra layer of strategy and excitement enabling players to meticulously plan and execute highstakes robberies with their chosen crew

What truly sets GTA 5 apart is the online multiplayer mode Grand Theft Auto Online Its a sprawling universe in its own right offering players the chance to explore Los Santos with their friends engage in various activities and even create their own content The consistent updates and additions by Rockstar have kept the online community vibrant and everevolving

Graphically GTA 5 continues to amaze even years after its initial release The attention to detail realistic lighting and meticulous character animations create an immersive experience that stands the test of time The level of optimization on various platforms is commendable ensuring that players across different systems can enjoy the game without compromising on visual quality

In conclusion Grand Theft Auto V is a magnum opus in the gaming world Its combination of a richly detailed open world engaging characters gripping narrative and diverse gameplay mechanics make it a landmark achievement Whether youre a fan of action storytelling exploration or simply causing virtual chaos GTA 5 offers an unforgettable experience Without a doubt it deserves a perfect 5star rating for its lasting impact on the gaming industry

Oh Grand Theft Auto V you wild sussy and absolutely ridiculous masterpiece Buckle up babes cause were about to dive into the zaniest world this side of Ohio Lemme tell ya when I first loaded up this game I was like nahhhhh they didnt just go there But they did and I forgor all my worries cause I was bout to come on this epic adventure gang gang

The moment I stepped into Los Santos I felt like an amogus in a world full of swaggy chaos I mean seriously where else can you casually jack a car chase a train and rob a convenience store in one go Its like a reallife favorite meme compilation except youre in control of the madness Yummers

But lets talk about them characters fam Michael Trevor and Franklin  what a trio Michaels like that older femboy in the hood tryna keep it lowkey but ending up in the wildest heists Trevor Oh my days that man is pure chaotic energy Every time hes on screen its an ermm yoinks moment and you just cant help but love the crazy mofo

And speaking of NPCs oh boy theyre a whole mood Youll find em bing chilling on the streets saying some of the most random stuff Its like theyre all part of a secret Ohio club or something Youll be walking along and some dude just hits you with a scrumptious line outta nowhere Only in GTA V I tell ya

The city itself Los Santos is a work of art so vibrant and full of life From the posh neighborhoods to the gritty back alleys its a melting pot of weird and wonderful You can even switch between characters which is like being in multiple places at once being your own femboy army  zesty times indeed

But lets be real sometimes the games humor can be a bit NPC level like theyre trying too hard to be funny And those loading screens ugh theyre longer than a crosscountry road trip from Ohio to California But hey nothings perfect right

In the end Grand Theft Auto V is a sussy rollercoaster of chaos and adventure a game that leaves you laughing scratching your head and yelling when the impostor is sus all in one sitting Its a classic thats imprinted its mark on gaming culture and you cant deny its impact So if you havent played it yet what are you waiting for Hop in fam and lets go on a wild goofy ahh ride through the crazy streets of Los Santos

Grand Theft Auto V is a sandbox game that takes place in the streets in the fictional crime city of Los Santos based upon los angeles Within the game you can complete missions heists own businesses and one of my favorites commit mass genocide upon innocent civilians All jokes aside GTA is one of my favorite games just because of the wide variety of content that it offers You can really do almost anything crimerelated that you see in movies ranging from escaping the cops in a highspeed police pursuit to robbing the richest man on earth

      The game has two entirely separate parts Theres the story mode and the online mode For a person who enjoys a compelling adventure story mode has one of the best experiences gaming has to offer with you being able to play the role as a criminal millionaire father of two millennial kids Michael a physco named Trevor or a nice but rough gangster who goes by Franklin 

     The online version on the other hand puts you in a server with around 30 other people offering a different experience entirely While you can still do things like rob stores do heists and run businesses the goal of the online version is to simply aquire as much money as possible and grief other players with the most overpowered vehicles and weapons the game has to offer This version requires A LOT more time and dedication than the story mode to really do anything and the grinding that is needed to earn any substantial amount of money is gruesome and tedius If you dont have irl money to just buy your way up the ranks or enough time for the insane amount of grinding I would just focus on the story mode 

Overall Both aspects of the game are cool but Id say the story mode is where the real fun is at The game doesnt cost much money and tbh it gives you a pretty good bang for your buck so I personally would recommend getting it Anywho that was my opinion hope yall have a good one peace

GTAV story mode has dozens of hours worth of content to offer and i have to point out that i dont personally know anyone who attained a 100 completion yet Thats just about where the fun ends GTA Online is completely broken and instead of fixing known issues Rockstar games keeps adding new content that breaks the game even more

all the new content that Rockstar Games adds is boring theres nothing interesting all the latest missions basically force you to use heavy weapons like minigun RPG etc which gets boring very quickly Its straight up impossible to finish them with a simple assault rifle whether its caused by a dozen enemies spawning at your own spawn point or the fact that the NPCs have an absurd accuracy and can give you a headshot even when they dont see you through the bushes

Old content has few missions that keep repeating over and over and become repetitive very quickly  at this point I am doing them just for the money and even then i often dont want to launch them

Public online sessions are unplayable you have about an 80 chance of joining a lobby with a cheater who will teleport you all across the map against your will lock you in a cage explode you or even give you modded money which can easily result in you getting banned and having your entire progress reset Rockstar games has supposedly done some changes recently but I have not noticed any difference same goes for my friends

I couldnt forget to mention how Rockstar games has recently removed almost 200 old vehicles with no rational explanation They are now incredibly difficult or impossible to obtain even though many of them were very popular in the playerbase The reasoning Rockstar games has given us is that they wanted to remove vehicles that werent being purchased very often to reduce how much we would have to scroll on the websites

GTA Online also used to have many different competitive jobs especially adversary modes I remember browsing through a list of hundreds of different adversary modes the game had to offer Recently I have come to the horrible discovery that Rockstar games has yet again deleted the old content and that the list now contains barely 60 adversary modes and exactly none of the ones i used to play I havent found any announcement about this anywhere only people complaining about it and being equally as confused as me

TLDR this game is absolutely not worth buying in 2023 and onward and thats coming from someone whos been playing since 2016 If you do want to get it do yourself a favor and wait for a sale

Honestly at this point i would not recommend GTA V it has been 10 Years and it just has a lot of issues Leveling up in the LS Car meet takes an insane amount of time their is no fast way to do it unless you wanna leave you PC on idle for hours to unlock car meet exclusive liveries The Dre contract while it can earn you a good amount of money the 40 minute cool down or so really kinda kills it This game has really become more of a cool down simulator where you always have a timer before you can make big money Which is of course intentional because shark cards exist and they want you to buy those Grinding is very tedious in this game so many vehicles and customizations are locked behind other items you have to purchase which could be really annoying The heists are a good way to make money but if you have no one to play with it can be difficult to do alone and at times just are not worth it Now GTA V can be fun to play online with friends and the story is not terrible by any means But all the stupid tactics they use to make everything as annoying as possible in hopes that you will buy their shark cards is well unbearable at times I have put many hours into this most of it is from idle leveling in the ls car meet Not really worth it though You also can not have more than one vehicle out at a time which is frustrating It should allow you to have at  least your car and jet out at the same time You also can not fast travel to your ownowned properties The cut scenes for missions and heists are not skippable because of how they were developed also you can not turn off dialogue alone because it is mixed with the SFX and listening to Lester and Franklin Dre etc gets really old really fast

Peanut Butter Cookies

Ingredients
1 cup unsalted butter
1 cup crunchy peanut butter
1 cup white sugar
1 cup packed brown sugar
2 large eggs
2 ½ cups allpurpose flour
1 ½ teaspoons baking soda
1 teaspoon baking powder
½ teaspoon salt
Directions
Beat butter peanut butter white sugar and brown sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth beat in eggs
Sift flour baking soda baking powder and salt into a separate bowl stir into butter mixture until dough is just combined Chill cookie dough in the refrigerator for 1 hour
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F 190 degrees C
Roll dough into 1inch balls and place 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets Flatten each ball with a fork making a crisscross pattern
Bake in the preheated oven until edges are golden about 10 minutes Cool on the baking sheets briefly before removing to a wire rack to cool completely

Grand Theft Auto V GTA 5 is an exhilarating openworld actionadventure game that captivates players with its sprawling virtual world and immersive gameplay Set in the fictional city of Los Santos the game offers a richly detailed environment where players can freely explore engage in various activities and embark on a gripping criminal narrative

The game boasts stunning graphics and attention to detail that bring the city to life from bustling urban streets to serene countryside landscapes The variety of characters each with their own stories adds depth to the narrative making for a compelling singleplayer experience

GTA 5s gameplay is a seamless blend of story missions heists and a myriad of side activities Whether driving highspeed vehicles participating in thrilling shootouts or just enjoying leisurely pastimes like tennis or golf theres never a dull moment The diverse range of vehicles weapons and customization options ensures that players can tailor their experience to suit their preferences

One highlight of GTA 5 is the innovative GTA Online mode offering a dynamic multiplayer environment Friends can team up to tackle missions races and challenges or engage in more chaotic activities like openworld mayhem and heists The constant updates and new content injected into the online world keep the experience fresh and exciting

While GTA 5s storyline and gameplay are undeniably engaging its important to note that the games mature themes including violence crime and adult content may not be suitable for all audiences Despite this GTA 5 remains a standout title in the gaming world offering a blend of action exploration and storytelling that continues to captivate players

I am a 45 yo father probably one of the oldest people playing this game I am a single father to my Son who is 14 now My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle so we installed it on his computer and he started playing By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game This was horrible for me as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him I loaded into the game picked my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well This game reminded me that theres fun to be had in everything and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories

Even if you dislike open world games even if you prefer another GTA title over this one and despite the pit that is GTA Online and the downright disgusting and disrespectful treatment towards fans and modders from TakeTwo Interactive there is no denying just how special Grand Theft Auto V is

This absolute beast of a game in single player still feels like the most rich beautiful and entertaining open world game ever made even after having finished it on all 7th and 8th gen consoles and PC

From excitedly coming home from school on September 17th 2013 to a freshly collected preorder for the Xbox 360 to reluctantly buying this game a fifth time on Steam in 2023 every playthrough feels like a fresh experience Whether it be the order in which I tackle main and side missions a new detail I never noticed previously a random event I dont recall or never discovered switching up my approach to a heist a radio song making action in the moment more impactful or just finding a new way to make my own fun out in free roam GTA V is a timeless masterpiece and I think Ill be revisiting even another decade down the line even if GTA VI tops it

Grand Theft Auto V A Captivating Dual Experience  Story Mode and Online Fun

 55  An Epic Crime Saga Awaits 

GTA V is an undisputed classic that continues to stand the test of time Rockstar Games has crafted a masterpiece that seamlessly weaves two enthralling experiences the thrilling Story Mode and the expansive Online world Whether youre a fan of immersive narratives or crave openworld chaos with friends GTA V delivers in every aspect

Story Mode
From the very first heist to the last adrenalinepumping escape GTA Vs Story Mode takes you on a rollercoaster ride through the criminal underbelly of Los Santos The diverse trio of protagonists Michael Trevor and Franklin bring unique personalities and perspectives making the narrative engaging and unpredictable

The city of Los Santos is a living breathing entity filled with vibrant characters stunning landscapes and a plethora of activities Exploring the world is a joy in itself with countless side missions activities and random encounters scattered throughout the map

The missions are incredibly wellcrafted offering a balanced mix of action driving and exploration The ability to switch between characters during missions adds a refreshing tactical element giving you multiple perspectives on unfolding events

Furthermore the attention to detail is second to none The radio stations pedestrians and city life all contribute to the immersive experience creating an atmosphere that draws you deeper into the games captivating universe

Online Mode
Once youve exhausted the singleplayer campaign GTA Online welcomes you to an everevolving multiplayer playground The sheer scale of the online world is astonishing and the possibilities are boundless

Forming a crew with friends or joining a public lobby opens up a wealth of activities to enjoy together Whether youre competing in adrenalinepumping races pulling off daring heists or just causing chaos in the streets GTA Online ensures youre never short of thrilling experiences

The regular updates and expansions bring fresh content keeping the online community engaged and excited From new vehicles and weapons to engaging game modes theres always something new to explore and conquer

One of the highlights of GTA Online is the potential for playercreated content Rockstars Creator tools empower you to design your own races deathmatches and other custom experiences fostering a vibrant and evergrowing usergenerated community

Conclusion
Grand Theft Auto V continues to shine as a crowning achievement in the gaming world With its compelling Story Mode and everexpanding Online Mode the game offers an unparalleled combination of storytelling and openworld freedom

Whether youre a singleplayer enthusiast or crave chaotic multiplayer fun GTA V caters to all tastes Its exceptional attention to detail engaging characters and a dynamic world ensure that every session feels fresh and exciting

If you havent experienced the epic saga of Grand Theft Auto V I wholeheartedly recommend diving into its thrilling story and exploring the vast possibilities of GTA Online Strap in for an unforgettable journey filled with heists highspeed chases and endless adventures in the sprawling playground that is Los Santos
